description.zh: 1. 導論 2. 策略藍圖 3. 營運管理流程 4. 顧客管理流程 5. 創新管理流程 6. 法規與社會流程 7. 無形資產與企業策略之對焦 8. 組織資本準備程度 9. 資訊資本齊備程度 10. 人力資本齊備程度 11. 根據企業策略客制化策略藍圖 12. 策略藍圖執行之企劃
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Strategy Maps3.Operations Management Processes4.Customer Management Processes5.Innovation Management processes6.Regulatory and Social Processes7.Aligning Intangible Assets to Enterprise Strategy8.Organization Capital Readiness9.Information Capital Readiness10.Human Capital Readiness11.Customizing Your Strategy Map to Your Strategy12.Planning the Campaign

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對 IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH) 教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP 服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

notes: 電子所和 AI 班合開

description.zh: (1) 物聯網概述，(2) 物聯網感知層，(3) 物聯網網路層，(4) 物聯網應用層，(5) 物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6) 無線感測網路 802.15.4 與 ZigBee，(7) 無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID 原理與應用，(9) WSNs 至 IoT，(10) 近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

notes: 電子所.AI 班。鐵道班合開

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用 Python 深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：? 車牌與門牌數字辨識？人臉辨識？1000 種影像分類？辨識 9000 種物件？自動駕駛模擬？嵌入式深度學習演算法？空虛，寂寞，覺得冷？讓深度學習來幫助你:? 遞迴式神經網路 (RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人？對抗生成網路 (GAN)：用 GAN 產生自己的夢中情人？深度強化學習 (DRL)：訓練 AI 跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

notes: 電子所，自動化所，電資外生，AI 班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 網路協定、2. 消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準、3. 錯誤更正碼：迴旋碼渦輪碼低密度同位檢查碼 BCH/RS 碼、4. 無線視訊傳輸的抗錯、5. 跨層資源分配、6. 無線區域網路、7. 隨意網路和感測網路、8. 無線個人 / 大都會 / 體域 / 網狀網路、9. 物聯網等最新發展
description.en: 1. Network protocols 2. Information theory, source coding and Video standards 3. channel coding: convolutional codes/turbo codes/LDPC codes/BCH/RS codes 4. Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線理論 2. 等量傳輸網路之合成 3. 集體元件微波電路 4. 半集總濾波電路之合成 5. 耦合傳輸線之物理參數 6. 耦合傳輸線濾波器 7. 指狀濾波器 8. 梳型濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line theory2.Synthesis of commensurate line networks3.Lumped element microwave circuits4.Synthesis of semi-lumped filter curcuits5.Physical parameters of coupled lines6.Coupled lines filter7.Interdigital filter8.Combline filter

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 針對低耗能射頻暨毫米波積體電路進行研究與設計：低耗能射頻暨毫米波前端電路低耗能低雜訊射頻暨毫米波放大器低耗能射頻暨毫米波混波器低耗能射頻暨毫米波壓控振盪器
description.en: Designed for low-voltage, low-energy RF and millimeter-wave integrated circuits:Low voltage, low energy consumption radio frequency millimeter wave front-end circuitLow voltage, low energy consumption and low noise RF and millimeter wave amplifierLow voltage, low energy consumption RF and millimeter wave mixerLow voltage, low energy consumption RF and millimeter wave voltage controlled oscillator

name.zh: 低耗能射頻暨毫米波積體電路特論
name.en: Low-Power Specialist RFIC and mmWave IC

notes: 電子所、半導體碩班、電資外生所合開，總人數限 35 人

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

notes: 碩班，工管碩、博班和管理博班合開

description.zh: 為取得工學碩士必修課程，3 至 6 個學分需先經系所核可。
description.en: For the degree of Master of Engineering 3 to 6 credits with department approval.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括：1. 機器學習基本概念與應用；2. 機器學習演算法概論 3. 歸納學習演算法 4. 決策樹演算法 5. 案例式學習演算法 6. 專家系統建立 7. 機器學習應用方法 8. 機器學習論文導讀 9. 機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

notes: 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 `影像處理` 與電腦輔助計算處理，藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用 (如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度，受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵，後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業，除提昇製造業之產品品質外，對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

notes: 四甲乙、碩合開

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。
description.en: Introduced simply in view of the goods in stock theory, curriculum content economy of batch for definite pattern, continuous and periodic inventory strategy, dynamic model and multi-stage system.

description.zh: 本課程主要分成三部分。第一部分介紹工業機器人的結構，分類和其工作空間等基礎。第二部分介紹機器人的端效器、語言指令及其控制系統和安全。最後再介紹機器人如何與系統相整合，以執行功能性的製造單元 (或製造系統)。
description.en: This course basically is composed of 3 parts. First, configuration, classification and work cell of the industrial robots will be introduced. Secondary, end-of-tooling, programming & instruction, control system controller and safety is covered. Finally, the robot and system integration to execute a functional manufacturing cell (or system) will be provided.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題：製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 本課程期望學生能夠能有獨立思考的能力，對產品建構出合理的實驗設計架構，透過採集人的生理與心理數據對產品進行人因工程評估，最後將實驗發現應用於產品的重新設計上，讓產品能夠更符合使用者的需求與認知。
description.en: In this course, students are expected to demonstrate independent thinking, develop a reasonable experimental design, conduct ergonomics evaluations on products by collecting both physiological and psychological data, and ultimately apply the findings to redesign products. This ensures that the products align more effectively with the needs and perceptions of users.

name.en: Ergonomics evaluation and redesign in products

description.zh: 本課程著重於隨機流量網路 (stochastic flow network) 的可靠度評估、分析和決策。在整個課程中，我們將介紹與隨機流量網路相關的數值分析方法、模擬技術和最佳化問題。此外，我們將在隨機流量網路模型的框架內深入探討最快路徑、多商品、路由政策和負載管理問題等主題。學生將有機會將這些方法和模型應用到實際系統中，包括電腦網路、電信、城市交通系統、電力傳輸網路和製造系統。
description.en: This course emphasizes the reliability evaluation, analysis, and decision-making aspects of stochastic flow networks. Throughout the course, we will introduce analytical methodologies, simulation techniques, and optimization problems related to stochastic flow networks. Furthermore, we will delve into topics like quickest path, multi-commodity, routing policies, and load management issues within the framework of stochastic flow network models. Students will have the opportunity to apply these methodologies and models to practical systems, including computer networks, telecommunications, urban traffic systems, power transmission networks, and manufacturing systems.

description.zh: 這是一門研究所課程，內容包括多元數據分析和高等回歸應用。本課程的目標是確保工業工程與管理領域的研究生能夠解釋、實現和操作幾種不同類型的基本回歸分析。本課程主要致力於高等回歸分析。重點是發展一個嚴格的微積分計算及矩陣代數為基礎的最小平方法 (OLS)、違反回歸假設、假說檢定及一般線性模型。此外，本課程的重點是協助學生理解分析技術這部分的領域知識，如：統計的基本概念 (描述和推理統計，概率分佈)，簡單線性回歸、多元線性回歸、邏輯回歸及對數線性模型之應用。
description.en: This course covers multivariate data analysis as well as advanced regression applications. The course is primarily devoted to advanced regression analysis. Th? emphasis is on developing a rigorous calculus and matrix algebra-based understanding of ordinary least squares (OLS), violations of regression assumptions, hypothesis testing, and the general linear model. In addition, the emphasis of this course is on the acquisition and understanding of analytical techniques such as basic concepts of statistics (descriptive and inferential statistics, probability distributions), simple linear regression, multiple linear regression, logistic regression, log-linear model.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 論文指導教授與醫師協商讓學生於在學期間的寒暑假到論文研究相關醫院進行實習。
description.en: Advisor in consultation with physicians suggest the student to practice at the hospital related to the thesis research during the winter and summer vacations at school.

notes: 限【智慧醫療器材組】學生修課；限 14 人；馬偕醫院實習

description.zh: 本課程主要在講述醫學工程基本觀念，內容包括解剖學及生理學、生物力學、復建工程及輔具科技、生醫材料、組織工程、生醫電子系統、生醫感測系統、生醫訊號處理、生醫影像處理、生醫超音波、生醫光學及雷射。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts of  Medical Engineering, including anatomy and physiology, biomechanics, rehabilitation engineering and assistive device technology, biomaterials, tissue engineering, biomedical electronics, biomedical sensing systems, biomedical signal processing, biomedical image processing, biomedical ultrasound, biomedical optics and laser.

notes: 限【智慧醫療器材組】學生修課

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

notes: {教室：綜合科館演講廳}

description.zh: 硬體簡介、影像處理 (單色、彩色、3D 及即時)、圖案識別 (Patten Recognition)、機械視覺於順序控制之應用、機械視覺於回授控制之應用、高速檢測、機械人與機械視覺之結合及應用。
description.en: Introduction to Hardware of Vision System, Image Processing (Monochrome, Color, 3D and real-time), Pattern Recognition, Application of MV to Sequential Control Application of MV to Feedback Control. High Speed Inspection, Combined Applications of Robotics and MV.

notes: ◎；計中電腦教室；限 50 人

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

notes: 限 20 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。探討專利相關法規及其應用：專利重要法規，專利實體審查基準，專利案例閱讀與分析，專利舉發 ，專利行政救濟，專利侵權鑑定，專利迴避性設計，簡易專利地圖製作，專利應用範例。
description.en: Discussing the patent laws and its applications, it includes:●A few important patent laws●Guidelines for substantive examination for invention patent●Practices in applying for patents●Practices in patent invalidations●Patent administrative remedy●Theories in patent infringement assessment●Innovative designing around patent●Patent mapsPatent cases study

name.zh: 高科技專利取得與攻防
name.en: High Tech Patent Applications and Protections

notes: 機電所、智財所、機械大四合開；研究所限 7 人

description.zh: 本課程介紹當前針對訊號及影像常用之辨識演算法，包括支持向量機、支持向量描述、主成分分析、非線性主成分分析、線性鑑別分析、自回歸模型、共同空間圖形濾波。
description.en: Topics include support vector machine (SVM), support vector data description (SVDD), principal component analysis (PCA), nonlinear PCA, linear discriminant analysis (LDA), autoregressive model, and common spatial

notes: 機電所。半導體班。機電博含外生專班合開，限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程旨在建立學生於醫學工程領域相關之知識。課程將為學生建立從小至基礎分子生物理論到大至人體以期具備生物相關領域之基礎知識，接續搭配基礎光電理論的建立並探討其應用於醫學工程相關領域之儀器及設備，內容亦因應時事而帶入課程討論，以期學生能對於醫學工程領域有更深一層之了解。此課程將以概論之方式進行，歡迎對此領域有興趣之同學學習。
description.en: Students taking this course will develop fundamental knowledge in the biomedical engineering field. Students will increase knowledge in biology and photoelectronics. The related equipment and apparatus applied in the biomedical engineering field will de be introduced. The course will also include current news to the students for expanding their knowledge in the biomedical engineering field. This course is an introductory course. The students who are interested in this field are welcomed to attend this course.

name.en: The Technology and Application of Biophotonics

notes: 機電所和機械自動化外生合開

description.zh: 本課程沿續「積體電路製程先進技術與設備」課程，介紹半導體世代機台開發與製程應用、關鍵元件設計概念與應用，著重科學基礎知識如何應用在半導體產業。
description.en: As an extension of “Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing” course, this course focuses on how the scientific knowledge is connected and applied to the real development of tools and introduces the evolution of the design and application of semiconductor tools and key components.

name.zh: 半導體尖端設備與關鍵元件
name.en: Semiconductor advanced equipment and key components

notes: 限 40 人；{教室：教務處安排}

description.zh: 顆粒物質充斥在日常生活且廣泛應用在許多工業問題中，例如筒倉、流體化床以及積層製造等等。本概論式課程將提供學生顆粒物質流的基礎概念以及模擬方法，並對其實際應用問題能有更深入的了解。課程將從顆粒物質的基本流動特性開始介紹，進而介紹顆粒物質流的離散模擬方法。此課程最後一部分將實際展示在工程上以及工業上所遇到的顆粒物質流問題。
description.en: Granular materials are ubiquitous in our daily lives and have attracted growing interest in many industrial applications, such as silo storage, fluidized bed, additive manufacturing, etc. This course is an introductory course to provide the general concepts and simulation methods of granular material flows, and a comprehensive understanding for its applications. The course will start from the basic flow characteristics of granular materials, and then move to the discrete simulation approaches. The final part of this course will demonstrate the practical engineering and industrial problems of granular material flows.

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電博及外生專班合開；限 25 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 基礎物理光學 2. 超音波簡介 3. 雷射超音波的生成 4. 雷射超音波的偵測 5. 刀鋒邊緣技術 6. 雙頻干涉儀 7. 費里裴洛干涉儀 8. 非線性晶體干涉儀 9. 雷射超音波技術於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 雷射超音波技術於材料性質量測之應用 11. 雷射超音波技術發展的未來趨勢
description.en: 1.Introduction to physical optics, 2.Introduction to ultrasonic waves, 3.Optical generation of ultrasound waves, 4.Detection of ultrasonic waves with optical methods, 5.Knife edge technique, 6.Hetrodyne interferometers in LUT, 7.Fabry-Perot interferometers, 8.Two-way mixing interferometers, 9.Application of LUT in nondestructive testing, 10.Application of LUT to material characterizations, 11.Future trend of LUT.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

notes: 機電所。製科所。半導體。機電博及外生專班合開；限 60 人

description.zh: 使用 partakar  code ，Ansys ， Mold  flow ， C  Mold ， Phoneic  等其中軟體，來計算一維穩態，一維暫態，二維穩態，二維暫態，之熱傳導問題，邊界層之偶合性流場問題，燃燒場之數值計算，電子熱傳相關系統。
description.en: By using software of Partankar Code, Ansys, Mold flow, C mold, and Phoneics parckage to compute the one dimension steady, are dimension unsteady, two dimension steady , two dimension unsteady heat conduction problems, boundary layer compling flow's problems,combustion calculations, electronic heat transfer problems.

notes: 限 25 人；綜科 610 教室

description.zh: 碩士學位論文.
description.en: Thesis for master degree's partially requirement.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 甲乙組

description.zh: 數值分析為一重要的工具，可用來預測大地工程在施工過程中的變形行為，作為防災的指標。本課程將包含有限元素法，有限差分法，離散元素法及邊界元素法，以配合 "非線性力學"" 岩石力學 ""土壤動力學" 等基礎課程，而延伸至應用的課程，如 "土壤與結構物互制行為"" 土石結構耐震分析 ""地盤改良".... 等等。
description.en: Numerical analysis includes finite element method, finite difference method,discrete element method,and boundary element method. These numerical tool can be based on foundamental geotechnical course to extend to application courses.

description.zh: 1. 結構之彎曲行為 2. 幾何非線性問題介紹 3. 彎矩再分配 4. 非彈性結構分析 5. 塑性分析 6. 韌性設計特別要求 7. 鋼筋混凝土梁之彎曲行為 8. 結構在返覆荷重下之行為
description.en: The behavior of nonlinear structure1 Bending in structure2 Introduction to geometrical-nonlinear problem3 Moment-redistribution 4 Non-elastics structure analysis5 Plasticity analysis6 Flexibility design special request7 The bending of the reinforced concrete in beam

notes: 土木 205

description.zh: 鉆探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology     , sampling and physical method, application of instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement .

notes: 土木 505

description.zh: 運用無人機技術做為測遙工具為一新穎科技，本課程以航空動力學為前題，分別介紹定翼及旋翼型無人機運作原理，基於航空攝影目的介紹飛行及航拍任務規劃。同時藉由實作，學生將自行組裝及設計無人機，並實際自行拍攝影像、產製所需之空間資訊，如：正射、地形等地理資訊系統圖資。
description.en: The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV), commonly known as a drone, is an aircraft without human pilot on board that flies autonomously, and is now been used widely for many aspects because of its convenience, high resolution, efficiency, etc. This course introducing first the aerodynamic of different drone frames, as well as the basic photogrammetry. Then try to design and assembly our drones. By using the home-made drones, the students will learn how to do the mission planning and take photos. Finally, the students should generate the geomatic information from their acquired images.

name.zh: 無人機攝影測量概論與實作

notes: 土木三甲乙和防災所合開 / 研究所上限 15 人 / 土木 500

description.zh: 物件導向程式設計以類別與物件為核心概念，輔以靜態的屬性及動態的方法，能夠直覺並且系統化地描述真實世界的事物，再輔以封裝、繼承、多型、介面等機制，能夠有效率地達到程式碼的共享及再利用，因此物件導向程式設計的功能不但被各式各樣的程式語言所廣泛支援，亦已形成了一門獨立的學問。而資料庫是重要、普遍且實用的資訊管理核心技術。但在另一方面，資料庫的開發與實作過程對於理解物件導向程式設計更是一個良好的契機與範例。本課程將以土木營建領域的範例出發，教導修課同學開發輔助工程資訊管理之資料庫系統，並在資料的分析處理及使用者介面的實作上導入物件導向程式設計的概念。
description.en: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm based on the concept of class and objects. With properties and methods that can describe the features of classes, a programmer can model the real world objects in an systematical way. In addition, the three important mechanisms of OOP, which are encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism, also enable a programmer to reuse and share their code easily and efficiently. Base on the Architecture/Engineering/Construction applications, this course aims to train the enrolled student for developing the basic OOP concepts, analyzing the database schemas, as well as implementing the OOP skills on information systems developments.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與資料庫應用

notes: 土木 106

description.zh: 為使土木營建背景的學生具備跨域學習與創用能力，本課程扣合當前重要時趨 (如 SDGs, ESG, LCA, USR 等) 於民生基礎建設之因應；擇採相關物聯網數位科技作為課程編排，介紹內容如無線感測、低工耗遠域網路邊緣運算、雲端管理、數位平台、綠能蓄電、人工智能、低 / 無代碼等專案開發的理與例，以符綠智營建之踐履，以臻永續經管之倡議。為求哲科合一，課程亦將思與學之認識與方法作簡扼介紹 (系統思考與問題導向學習)。
description.en: To achieve interdisciplinary learning and Innovative creativity for civil engineering students, this course presents the Internet of Things (IoT) to social infrastructure development including green-intelligent construction/maintenance and resilient adaptation briefly. To aim at the initiate of sustainable development goals (such as SDGs, ESG, LCA, USR) applied to civil engineering, some vital issues in this course would be focused as follows,WSN (Wireless Network), LPWAN (Low Power Wide-Area Network),Edge Computing, e-Cloud Management, Digitized Platform (PaaS/IaaS/SaaS), Green Energy and Cell, Artificial Intelligences, Low- & No-code techniques, etc.Meanwhile, Systems Thinking (ST) and Problem-based Learning (PBL) , which are crucial for philosophy of science, would be introduced for this holistic approach.

name.zh: 民生建設物聯網於綠智與韌性營建
name.en: Infrastructure IoT to Green-Intelligent and Resilient Construction

notes: 2 週，土木三甲乙和防災所合開 / 研究所上限 12 人 / 土木 205【停開】

description.zh: 1. 離岸風場設計通論，2. 海氣象及風力計算，3. 強度，疲勞，服務，意外極限，4. 結構及超元素模擬，5. 設計波浪力及地震力，6. 工程製造，7. 設計力總表，8. 結構桿件設計，9. 結構接頭設計，10. 離岸風場安裝
description.en: 1. Offshore wind turbine structure design overview, 2. Metocean and wind load calculations, 3.Ultimate/fatigue/serviceability/accidental limit states, 4.Structural modeling and super-element, 5. Wave and seismic loads, 6.Manufacturing and fabrication, 7. Design load summary table, 8. Structural member design, 9. Structural joint design, 10. Transportation and installation

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

notes: 土木四甲乙 & 防災所合開 / 研究所上限 30 人 / 先大樓

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

notes: 土木 208

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

notes: 2 週【停開】

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如 RMR 法及 Q 法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

notes: 土木 205

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

notes: 土木 106

description.zh: 應用定量分析法於水資源規劃與管理，並介紹系統分析、本益比之評估、多目標規劃與風險評估。
description.en: Quantitative analytical methods in water resources planning and management; introduction to systems analysis, benefit/cost, multi-objective planning and risk assessment.

notes: 1 週【停開】

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

notes: 上限 20 人 / 土木 308

description.zh: 平行運算指的是將需要耗費大量電腦 CPU 時間的複雜工程模擬問題平行化，分散到不同處理器上同時同步執行，以求能在合理的時間內獲致結果，並應用在工程設計或理論建構上。在本課程中將介紹平行運算的原理（Concurrency and Synchronization），分辨可平行化和不可平行化的問題，探討平行運算的演算法和可計算性，以及介紹將程式平行化的實用技術，並分析程式容錯性和可靠度（Fault Tolerance and Reliability），以幫助學生將平行運算應用在土木工程和學術研究中，學生將有機會使用平行化程式語言（High Performance Fortran）開發應用程式，本課程先修課程為程式設計，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Parallel computing is a methodology to handle complex engineering problems by distributing the intensive computation work to different processors to process simultaneously in order to obtain the results in a reasonable amount of time. This course will introduce the basic theory of parallel computing, teach how to identify problems that are parallelizable, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of parallel computing to civil engineering problems. Students will have opportunities to obtain hands-on experience by developing their own parallel programs (using High Performance Fortran). The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

notes: 土木 208

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業 (Best Management Practice, BMP) 之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

notes: 土木 308

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 碩士論文寫作
description.en: A Student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

notes: 車輛所和機電博含外生班合開

description.zh: 1. 基本車輛動態簡介 2. 駕駛人模型 3. 引擎／動力系統控制 4. 恆速行駛控制 5. 防滑驅動 / 防鎖死煞車控制 6. 四輪轉向控制 7. 主動式／半主動式懸吊 8. 智慧交通系統 9. 主動式安全系統 10. 複合動力控制系統
description.en: To provide an overview of Vehicle Dynamics and Control Systems of intelligent vehicles in ITS.  Students will learn introduction to vehicle dynamics, driver modeling, driving simulation, engine/power-train control, cruise control, traction control/ABS, four-wheel steering, steer-by-wire, active/semi-active suspension, intelligent traffic systems, active safety technologies, and advanced power-train technologies.  Upon completion of this course, students should be able to follow the literature on these subjects and perform independent design, research and development work in this field.

notes: 車輛所和機電博含外生班合開

description.zh: 課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，. 灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。
description.en: Fuzzy control and grey system are introduced in this course.  Then students can apply these theories to control systems and vehicle control.  Contents are fuzzy sets, inference, design of fuzzy controller, application, gray system, gray prediction, gray modeling, and gray control.

notes: 普通教室 及 綜科 610 (4 週) 車輛所和機電博含外生班合開

description.zh: 透過自駕車理論與實務的課程講述，以及搭配業師實作經驗分享，除可以使修課同學對自駕車研究有基本概念之外，也可以藉本堂課引發對新興車輛技術研究領域與其實際應用之興趣。本課程涵蓋內容為自駕車軌跡規劃與控制、先進駕駛輔助控制設計、自駕車感知資料處理及物件偵測演算法、及 AI 技術應用於自駕車相關功能設計。本課程根據授課主題搭配實驗單元與期末專題，配合使用 Matlab/Simulink、CarSim、Python、AI ToolBox 等工具軟體，讓修課同學可應用課堂所學來進行自駕車演算法與技術開發，及透過模擬結果分析與驗證。
description.en: This course aims to teach the lessons of autonomous vehicle (AV) theory and practical applications. Moreover, with the experience sharing and cooperative lecturing from industrial experts, students can gain more knowledge about the fundamental concepts of AV research. The course introduces major contents including path planning and tracking control design, advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS), perception data processing and detection algorithms, and AI-based technologies in the applications of AV. The course will arrange some labs and the term project to provide students, through conducted simulation analysis and verification, with an in-depth understanding of the emerging technology of AV.

notes: 車輛所和機電博含外生班合開

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論，線性規劃法，非線性規劃法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規劃法介紹，精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 配合 USR 計畫  綜科 610

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 碩博合開課程，碩士班請選本課號

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

notes: 能源所和機電博含外生合開

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制 2. 區域型電力能管理策略 3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念 4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析 5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集 6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 本課程為半導體與光電廠務設進階課程，主要針對半導體與光電廠務設施作深入的論述，課程包含廠務設施的九大系統：冰水機系統、排氣系統、電力監控系統、壓縮空氣系統、氮氣系統、純水系統、真空系統、製程冷卻水系統及外氣空調系統。期使修習本課程之學生有一和實務聯結之機會，並和理論作相相互映證。有校外教學且學生必需完成一小型計劃.
description.en: This advanced course aims to provide students a broad scope of hand-on knowledge on the facility system of a semiconductor or photonic fabrication factory. The facility system includes nine sub-systems: chilled water system, exhaust air system, compressed air system, process cooling water (PCW) system, vacuum system, ultra pure water (UPW) system, power and monitoring system, nitrogen system and make-up air system. Course material is basically based on and closely linked with field operational experience. A factory visit tour will be arranged. A mini-project will be carried by participating students.

name.zh: 進階半導體與光電廠務設施
name.en: Advanced course on facility system of semiconductor and photonic fabrication plants.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
description.en: The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, the two laws combined in analysis: the destruction of exergy, single-phase systems, exergy analysis, multiphase systems, refrigeration, thermodynamic optimization, and irreversible thermodynamics.

description.zh: 離岸風力發電是在海上建設風力發電廠，電廠通常建於大陸礁層 (棚)，利用風能進行發電，它較陸上風力發電具有更高的風速，所以能提供更多的電力。面對全球溫室氣體減量趨勢與達成非核家園願景，政府已規劃 2025 年再生能源發電占比 20％之政策目標，為達成此一政策目標，政府規劃以太陽光電及離岸風電作為主力，其中離岸風力原規劃於 2025 年累計達 3 GW（10 億瓦）。為了讓學生了解離岸風力發電熱流與空氣動力學之基本原理與應用，特別於大四與研究所共同合開這門課。本課程內容主要包括：(1) 離岸風電簡介，(2) 流體力學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(3) 熱傳學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(4) 空氣動力學基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(5) 電腦輔助離岸風機之氣動分析。
description.en: Offshore wind power is the use of wind farms constructed in bodies of water, usually in the ocean on the continental shelf, to harvest wind energy to generate electricity. Higher wind speeds are available offshore compared to on land, so offshore wind power’s electricity generation is higher per amount of capacity installed. In the face of the trend of global greenhouse gas reduction and the realization of the non-nuclear homeland vision, the government has planned a policy goal of renewable energy generation in the proportion of 20% in 2025. In order to achieve this policy goal, the government plans to use solar photovoltaic and offshore wind power as its main force. Among them, offshore wind power was originally planned to reach 3 GW (1 billion watts) in 2025. To assist students to understand the principle and application of thermo-fluid and aerodynamics on offshore wind power, this course is opened for seniors of undergraduate students and graduate students. The main content includ

name.zh: 離岸風電之熱流與空氣動力學基礎
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of Thermo-Fluid and Aerodynamics on Offshore Wind Power

notes: 與能源四合開

description.zh: 中文概述：碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 計中電腦教室，碩二

description.zh: 這是一門旨在介紹基礎統計原理和方法的課程，並包括 R 語言的教學。本課程的總體目標是建立研究生在單變量統計的知識與技術。本課程著重概念理解應用，不涉及公式推導。主題包括單變量和雙變量分佈的介紹，數據展示，描述統計，標準常態分佈，學生 t 分佈，用於測試平均值的推斷統計方法，相關性，以及簡單 / 多元線性回歸。本課程還向學生介紹 R 數據分析系統。本課程無先修課程的要求。
description.en: This is a course designed to provide an introduction to the principles and methods of statistics using R. The overall goal of the course is to provide graduate students with a foundation to quantitative data analysis that will allow them to build future skills. This course provides an applied approach to statistical analysis for research. Topics include introduction to univariate and bivariate distributions, data displays, descriptive statistics, the standard normal distribution, student’s t-distribution, inferential statistical methods for testing means, correlation, and simple/multiple linear regression. This course also introduces the student to the R data analysis system. No formal course prerequisites.

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含 SPSS、ERIC 及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 探討網路專題與問題導向學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習專題與問題導向之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、環境、教師教學、學生學習、評量、實際案例、未來趨勢。
description.en: To explore  advanced issues on Web project-based and problem-based learning including their theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, teacher teaching,student learning, assessment, practical cases, and future treand etc...

name.zh: 網路專題與問題導向學習
name.en: Special Topic on Web Project-Based & Problem-Based Learning

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 碩一甲（學號：1-40）

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目，在教授個別指導下，進行實驗之研究，以培養學生尋找相關資料，文獻及獨立研究的訓練，並將其研究成果撰寫成碩士論文。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study in master level.  Students will be assigned a research topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final master thesis are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎 (a) 輸送現象 (b) 高分子黏彈學 (c) 高分子混煉。(II) 高分子加工學之應用 (a) 壓模法 (b) 沖模法 (c) 反應沖模法 (d) 絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA 結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及 DNA 複製及轉錄和 RNA 轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR 和 DNA 重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合 SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray 等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 有機光譜鑑定特論是鑑定有機分子結構的必備學問，也是研究有機分子行為常用之工具，本課程的主要目的是讓同學了解各種光譜學的基本原理，分析與其常見之應用，並透過實例之光譜分析與解題技巧，奠定同學相關研究的基礎.
description.en: Organic Spectroscopy Special Topics is an essential knowledge for identification of organic molecular structures. It is also a very useful tool for researches on the behavior of organic molecules. This course is aimed to introduce the basic principles and applications of the organic spectroscopy to students. The students will also practice in the class on analyzing the sample spectra so that they can apply these techniques to their research work.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 高分所及 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程將討論可持續發展的原則，結合了化學原理與最新的綠色化學技術，強調可再生資源的運用、廢棄物減量和環保製程。學生將學到如何設計具有較低環境影響的新型材料，探索綠色合成方法，以及瞭解綠色能源的應用。
description.en: This course explores the principles of sustainable development in green chemistry technologies, including renewable resources, minimizing waste, and employing eco-friendly processes. Students will acquire the skills to design innovative materials with a diminished environmental footprint, delve into green synthesis   and green energy.

description.zh: 本課程針對在不同物理和化學機制下顏色產生的原因，如振動和簡單的激發解釋了白熾（如：火焰）、氣體激發（如：霓虹管、極光）和震動與旋轉（如：藍冰和水）的顏色等，以及染料和顏料之化學結構、製造方式和基本化性予以闡述，以便對色料的相關應用有較為明晰的瞭解。
description.en: This course targets at the color derived from a variety of physical and chemical mechanisms are summarized. Includes vibrations and simple excitations to explain the colors of incandescence (e.g., flames), gas excitations (neon tube, aurora), and vibrations and rotations (blue ice and water). And also chemical structure, manufacturing and properties of main dyes and pigments are studied. Further applications of the color stuff are explained.

notes: 分子四和高分所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於建築與都市設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into architecture and urban design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研二課程目標： 透過設計課題培養自實質至非實質環境與實踐之總體操作能力 ，其深度與廣度將是評價判準。 課程概要： 就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程 書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 2nd Grade Through different design topics, the disciples accomplish the course goal－enhancing the ability of general manipulation and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation, which includes design result and a report of the process of ascertainment, will be required for evaluation. The evaluation will emphasize on the depth and width of ascertainment and practice.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一) 大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二) 都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三) 都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四) 新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1) Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2) Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3) Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design (4) Exercise on urban design for new development area

notes: 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性 (de-terrorization) 的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施 (infrastructure) 的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性 (alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的 "實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分：全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築 / 地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en: In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

notes: 建築四建都所合開

description.zh: 臺灣建築史的發展大約可分成受到漢民族影響的傳統建築，以及日本和西方世界影響的近現代建築，本課程主要探究臺灣近現代建築發展的歷程。本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣近現代建築分為三個主題：(1) 臺灣近現代建築的背景、(2) 臺灣殖民時期、(3) 二次大戰之後的臺灣建築。
description.en: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

notes: 1 週【停開】

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1. 概論 2. 文化遺產防災之重要性 3. 文化遺產防災之基本策略 4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式 5. 文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

notes: 設計 751

description.zh: 國際能源署 (IEA) 呼籲全球國家訂定淨零碳排路徑，國內也發佈「台灣 2050 淨零路徑及策略」，具體宣告了淨零碳排的目標期程與行動方案，針對建築部門納入低碳 (低蘊含碳) 建築評估 (Low Embodied-carbon Building Rating System, LBERS)，藉由標準化、透明化的建築資訊來剖析建築生命週期各階段對環境的影響，以培養永續淨零概念並具備評估整棟建築生命週期的碳足跡、甚進一步提出減碳熱點，了解建築物的節碳潛力所在。了解國內外淨零碳排路徑策略、具備建築物生命週期的整體流程概念、具備建築碳足跡計算操作能力。
description.en: IEA (The International Energy Agency) proposes to set a global net carbon emission roadmap, and domestically launch a net target and action plan, targeting the building sector, the Low Embodied-carbon Building Rating System(LBERS) a simple and effective assessment tool to evaluates the carbon footprint of a building's life cycle through standardized and transparent building information, the impact of various stages of the building life cycle on the environment is analyzed step by step. This course not only evaluates the carbon footprint of the entire building life cycle but also further identifies carbon hotspots and provides carbon reduction strategies, hence understanding carbon savings potential of buildings.

name.en: The Evaluation for Bulding’s Carbon Footprint

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹應用語言學 / 文學文化各領域重要議題與研究趨勢，以提供研究生在準備寫作研究論文時研究方向討論及導引。
description.en: This course introduces the main sub-disciplines, key issues and research trends in Applied Linguistics/Literature and Culture. It aims to provide graduate students with the fundamental knowledge and guidance needed for preparing and writing a research paper.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹質性研究中傳統的研究法，藉由深入探討採用不同質性研究方法的研究報告、以及實地進行質性研究以幫助學生掌握各項質性研究方法的運用與分析方法的技巧。
description.en: This course aims at introducing fundamental qualitative research methods to help students acquire skills and experiences in adopting a wide range of methodological and analytical techniques through studying qualitative research reports and conducting the qualitative study.

description.zh: 本課程介紹常用的統計分析方法和主要量化研究方法。課程主要容包括問卷調查法，實驗研究法，相關研究法，抽樣方法，測驗信度與效度，X2 考驗，相關分析，t 考驗，變異數分析，單迴歸，多元迴歸。
description.en: The course is designed for graduate students studying in fields related to applied linguistics and education who are interested in using descriptive and inferential statistics to analyze data gathered from major quantitative research designs. The course covers the following topics: overview of quantitative research designs including survey research, experimental and quasi-experimental research, and correlational research; measuring of reliability and validity; sampling, hypothesis testing and statistical significance, correlational analysis, tests of mean differences, tests of frequencies, analysis of variance, linear regression, and multiple regression.

name.zh: 統計分析與量化研究法

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

notes: 碩士班

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

notes: {教室：綜合科館演講廳}

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1) 脊椎生物力學、(2) 關節生物力學、(3) 骨折生物力學、(4) 復健生物力學、(5) 運動生物力學、(6) 心血管生物力學、(7) 植入物設計原理、(8) 手術器械設計原理、(9) 矯具設計原理與 (10) 病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

notes: 限 21 人

description.zh: 彈性力學為固體力學的重要分支，研究彈性物體在外力和其他外界因素（包括外力、溫度、電磁場等）作用下產生的變形和內力。彈性力學廣泛應用於建築、機械、化工、航太等工程領域，是學習有限元素法、複合材料力學、破裂力學和疲勞等的基礎課程，對於培養學生的專業基礎，思維方法和獨立工作能力有著重要意義。
description.en: Elasticity is a branch of Solid mechanics that deals with determination of the stress, strain, and displacement distribution in an elastic solid under the influence of external forces. This subject has applications in many engineering and scientific fields such as civil engineering, mechanical engineering, materials engineering, and aeronautical and aerospace engineering. The subject also provides the basis for more advanced work in finite element analysis, mechanics of composite materials, fracture mechanics.

notes: 製科所。機電博含外生專班合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 本課程深入探討人工智慧領域的基礎知識和最新技術，包括機器學習、深度學習、自然語言處理、生成對抗網絡等領域。課程還介紹了最新的 AI 技術趨勢，包括注意力機制、自監督學習、大型 AI 通用模型和元學習等，並提供了相關領域的案例研究和實習操作。課程運作模式：學員將參與課堂討論和小組活動，以促進想法交流和知識分享。學生可根據課程選擇進階專題研究，深入探討特定主題並提交最終報告。最後三週專題研究將被評估並可獲得額外獎勵，學生可在學期中向授課教師報名參與專題研究。
description.en: Course Overview: This course delves into the fundamentals and latest advancements in the field of artificial intelligence, covering topics such as machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and generative adversarial networks. The course also introduces the latest trends in AI technology, including attention mechanisms, self-supervised learning, large-scale AI models, and meta-learning, and provides case studies and hands-on exercises in related areas.Course Execution: Participants will engage in classroom discussions and group activities to facilitate idea exchange and knowledge sharing. Students may choose to undertake advanced research projects on specific topics of course and submit final reports. The final three weeks of research projects will be assessed and eligible for additional rewards. Students can sign up for research projects with the course instructor during the semester.

name.zh: 人工智慧的基礎與創新 (二)
name.en: Foundations and Advances in Artificial Intelligence II

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

notes: 經管所和 IMBA 合開

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程為適性揚才的職涯訓練課程，旨在於幫助學生探索自我、認識職場、學習軟硬實力並打開求職視野。課程將分為職涯探索、職場技能、企業職能及求職技能等四大類主題，邀請業師到班授課，並且連結實習機會，厚植學生求職信心。
description.en: This course is an adaptive career training course designed to help students explore their potential, understand the workplace, learn soft and hard skills, and extend career opportunities. The courses will be divided into four major themes: career exploration, workplace skills, industry introduction, resume writing and interview skills. Lecturers from different profession will be invited to share their domain knowledge in the class, and internship opportunities will be linked to encourage student to start career planning.

name.zh: 企業優質人才學用培育課程

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 廣告策略與企畫為廣告之進階課程，學生需結合行銷，廣告，創意，消費者心理及行為等領域之知識，並具備優秀之企畫能力，為所指定之企業，產品或理念規畫完整之整合行銷傳播企畫案。
description.en: nternational Advertising and Media Strategy takes a market-oriented approach to the total campaign. The course interrelates planning, creative and technical skills with emphasis on problem-solving and marketing communications.

notes: 經管所 & IMBA

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

notes: 經管所和管理博班合開

description.zh: 網際網路與相關應用程式從根本上改變了消費者日常生活的各個方面。行銷從業人員也已經將他們的工作轉移到了網路上。本課程的目的在於幫助學生認識網路資料分析在數位行銷領域中的作用，並實際應用網路分析工具和技術來監控網路行銷活動的績效。課程主題包括：Web 數據分析與行銷簡介、Web 日誌分析、網站表現指標和關鍵績效指標、網站監控和趨勢分析、網路廣告及網路分析的未來趨勢。
description.en: The Internet and web applications have fundamentally changed nearly every aspect of our daily lives. Marketing practitioners have shifted their efforts online. This module aims to help students recognise the role of web analytics within the digital marketing landscape, and practically apply web analytics tools and technologies to monitor performance of web based marketing activities. Topics to be covered include: Introduction to web analytics and web data driven marketing; Web server log analysis; Web metrics and key web performance Indicators; Web monitoring and trends analysis; Dashboard design; Navigation analysis; Online advertising; Future trends of web analytics.

name.zh: 網路行銷研究與資料分析

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性與消費者行為相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。課程主要以個案討論方式進行。
description.en: The topics of this course include social media, consumer behavior, interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括 1. 合併的動機與理論介紹，2. 購併的型態與策略規畫，3. 公司購併時的法律規畫 4. 美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5. 美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討 6. 金融控股公司相關議題，7. 合併後之相關整合規畫等
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding Mergers and Acquisitions. Topics are as follows: 1.Theory of M&A, 2.Types of M&A and Strategic Planning, 3.Legal Planning, 4. Types of FHC in the U.S., Japan, and Europe, 5.Case Study on M&A of Japanese Banks and U.S. Banks, 7.Topics on Financial Holding Companies, 8 .Integration after M&A.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在讓學生了解如何投資理財與做好風險管控，要成為一個投資人必須要了解市場有哪些資產可以投資？這些資產的風險與預期報酬率為何？如何評價資產？如何了解各種投資策略，並找出最適合自己的策略？本課程會以理論結合實務的上課方式，教導學生學習以上投資知識。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with an understanding of fundamental concepts of the investments. The main topics to be covered in this course include securities markets, portfolio theory, futures and option markets and mutual funds.　Students successfully completing this course should have the basic knowledge of investment analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要運用最佳化方法解析動態成長、風險檢測、供應鏈調控等管理與決策問題，探討的主題包括：環球供應鏈問題、投資組合問題、生產規劃、配送規劃、排程規劃等。
description.en: This course mainly talks about how to use optimization methods to analyze the management and decision making problems such as dynamic growth, risk evaluation, and supply chain adjustment etc. The topics to be discussed include: 1.global supply chain management; 2.portfolio selection problems; 3.production planning; 4.distribution and transportation planning; 5.scheduling problems.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

notes: 須修過資料探勘課程

description.zh: 本課程能讓學生了解各種產業相關個案研究。個案涵蓋國內外企業案例。資料來源包含哈佛大學個案、光華基金會個案、及其他相關發表之個案資料。本課程希望學生能透過此案例討論以瞭解產品實務之營運。
description.en: This course will cover the case study related to the management of all industries. The cases will be from international and local enterprise. The teaching material will be from Harvard University case, KMCC case, and other public case. The purpose this course is to provide students a practical indusyries’ scenario.

description.zh: 進階設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。本學期主要學習目標，幫助每一位同學有效完成研究計畫的審核。
description.en: Advanced Design project in studies, history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。 Hence, students are required to finish and pass the accessment concerning detailed research scheme.

notes: 碩一必修

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括 (1) 人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及 (2) 規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

notes: 創新所、設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topic includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

notes: 上限 40 人

description.zh: 設計是一個相當多元的領域，是技術的化身、美學的表現和文化的象徵。它是社會、經濟、技術、藝術、心理學和生理學的結合。本課程旨在構建學生對設計原理和理論的認識，提高學生對美感和設計作品的鑑賞能力，並為他們提供專業術語。這些知識構成了幫助年輕從業者實現其藝術目標並在高專業水平上執行項目工作的核心。本課程基於對現代設計行業的概述，期望建立一個關於設計思維主題的全景視角。
description.en: Design is a quite multiplex domain, technical incarnation, esthetics performance and cultural symbol. And it is the union of the social, economics, technology, arts, psychology, and physiology. The course aims to structure students’ knowledge about the principles and theories of design, improve their abilities to appreciate the aesthetic sense and design works, and provide them with professional terminology. This knowledge constitutes the core which helps young practitioners to attain their artistic objectives and perform project work on a high professional level. This course is based on an overview of the modern design industry, expect to establish a panorama perspective on the subject of design thinking.

notes: 配合 USR 計畫 創新所、設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程將專注於創新產品與混合實境的設計研究實務，期望透過虛實整合與使用者經驗的核心概念，應用研究方法深入探究設計問題與使用者經驗中的痛點，探討實體端產品設計和虛擬端的服務設計之各種實務應用，進而透過設計方法與軟硬體技術落實創新概念，最終達到設計出符合與滿足使用者在未來生活中的各種設計服務與體驗。
description.en: This course will focus on the design research case study of innovative products and mixed reality. It is expected that through the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience, it will apply research methods to deeply explore design problems and pain points in user experience and explore physical product design and virtual reality. We will integrate various possibilities of service design with industry case study. Then, we intend to utilize the implemented innovative concept by design methods, software, and hardware technologies to achieve the design services and experiences that meet and satisfy users in future life.

name.zh: 產品與混合實境設計研究 (二)
name.en: Product and Mixed Reality Design Research (2)

notes: 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於藉由專業養成，累積實務技能，期能在室內裝修設計及材料技術之各面向，並展現生活環境設計實務操作能力。藉由國內外設計競賽主題與各項產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、需求分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒。因本所結合設計、藝術、人文、木工等各領域的學生，整合培育創新設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具各種專長的研究生，協同完成生活環境設計的專案設計研究，或是透過生活環境設計專案執行的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專案執行為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: The objective of this course is to accumulate practical skills through professional development,to be able to demonstrate the practical operation ability of interior decoration design and material technology,to demonstrate the practical operation ability of living environment design.Through the theme of design competitions and various industry-university cooperation design projects,practical exercises are carried out,focusing on data collection,demand analysis,innovative ideas and achievement expression advanced ability cultivation,hoping to let students show their brilliance on the stage of design competitions.Another objective is to construct a multi-field interactive learning environment,which is a project-oriented learning mode,and graduate students with various specialties can be combined to collaborate on the project design research of living environment design,or through the implementation of living environment design projects.

name.zh: 生活環境設計專案研究
name.en: Project Research of Living Environment Design

notes: 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

notes: 碩士班

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

notes: 碩士班 科研國際會議廳

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1. 程式語言之發展與分類，2. 設計原理，3. 語法與語意，4. 資料型態，5. 控制結構，6. 正規語言，7. 抽象資料型態，8. 物件導向程式語言，9. 函式語言，10. 邏輯語言，11. 平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

notes: 二教 207

description.zh: 本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟，透過課程專題製作，學者將學習以 UML 記載分析與設計之結果，並使用一個物件導向語言 (如 Java 或 C++) 實作之。課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML 介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析，使用個案，觀念模型，有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案，合作圖，類別圖，設計模板，3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML  2. Object-oriented languages and environments  3. Object-oriented software development process 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, conceptual models, finite state machine models 3.2 Object-oriented design - real use cases, collaboration diagrams, class design diagrams, design patterns 3.3 Construction - mapping design to codes 4. Term project.

notes: 資工四。資工所合開，兼任週四 346

description.zh: 使學生熟悉計算機圖的基本原理、方法、及工具，內容包括： （１）二維及三維幾何圖形之產生 （２）二維及三維何圖形之轉換 （３）隱藏面及隱藏線之處理（４）色彩原理 （５）光影及暗影技術 學生將需撰寫電腦程式或使用幾何算圖程式
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with basic principles, methods, and tools of computer graphics. Topics include: 1.Generation of 2D and 3D geometric shapes 2.2D and 3D transformation 3.Hidden surfaces and hidden lines techniques 4.Color principles 5.Shading and shadowing techniques. The student will be required to write computer programs and/or use modeling and rendering packages

notes: 資工四。資工所。創新 AI 班合開

description.zh: 1. 單元測試 2. 互動測試 3. 整合測試 4. 分析與設計模型測試 5. 功能測試 6. 圖形介面測試 7. 系統測試
