description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何將 AI 技術應用於語用學研究，著重多元社會情境與語境之下之語言使用分析與詮釋。此課程將深入淺出討論語用學核心理論部分，並結合 AI 大型語言模型 (例如: GPT, Gemini, 以及 Claude 等) 實際操作，讓學生親自學習辨識、分析與評估各種自然語言表現，包含言語行為 (speech acts)、會話隱含 (conversational implicature) 及禮貌策略 (politeness strategies) 等現象。本課程以專題式學習融合理論與實務，幫助同學從全新的 AI 驅動視角進行語用學研究，在分析人類真實語言互動行為之外，更同時能了解 AI 生成文本在語用能力方面的優勢與局限。
description.en: AI & Pragmatics is a graduate-level course that explores how artificial intelligence (AI) can enhance the study of pragmatics by focusing on the analysis and interpretation of language use across diverse social and contextual settings. Students will integrate core theories of pragmatics with hands-on experience using Large Language Models (e.g., GPT, Gemini, and Claude) to identify, analyze, and evaluate key pragmatic phenomena such as speech acts, conversational implicatures, and politeness strategies—and, more importantly, apply these skills to real-world language tasks. Built around project-based learning, the course blends theory with practice, preparing students to conduct research in pragmatics from a fresh, AI-driven perspective. It equips them not only to analyze authentic language interactions but also to critically assess the strengths and limitations of AI-generated texts in terms of pragmatic competence.

description.zh: 1. 基本觀念，2.RC 主動網路之元件與子網路，3. 具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析，4. 雙極接面電晶體之線性應用，5. 運算放大器之線性應用，6. 網路靈敏度，7. 分解，結構，及靈敏度，8. 二階濾波電路之合成與設計，9. 梯形濾波電路之合成與設計，10. 信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計

name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: 配合高科技的應用，電力系統亦朝高科技發展，以便對用戶提供高品質、高可靠性、高效率及高安全性的電力，其中所面臨的問題很多必須加以解決，此有賴於良好的電力網路規劃，及對問題的分析探討。為此，本課程針對現今及未來電力系統的發展，探討其網路之規劃及分析，主要內容包括：1. 先進電力網路之發展趨勢分析（包括發電、輸電、變電、配電等各級網路之發展趨勢分析）2. 先進電力網路規劃之範圍及要項（包括系統架構、線路及設備之型式、數量、容量、位置及配置方式等）3.	負載特性之變化分析及負載成長預測（包括一般負載及科技產業負載）4. 先進電力網路規劃所需考慮之因數及相關條件分析（包括負載需求、能源供應、環保要求、經濟因素、區域特性、社會因素、建設成本、運轉維護、未來成長、、、）5. 先進電力網路之最佳規劃模式建立（包括目標（成本）函數及限制條件之探討及模式之建立）6. 先進電力網路最佳規劃之解空間及求解方法探討（包括單目標最佳規劃及多目標最佳規劃）7. 台灣電力網路規劃之特點 8. 實際案例之演練及解說
description.en: Electric power system is developing with high technology for supplying customers power with high quality, reliability, efficiency and security.  Many problems associated with this development should be solved, which are very relied on the well planning and analysis for the power network. For this, the course is aimed to the network planning and analysis for the today's and future's power system developments. The main contents of this course are:1.The development tendency of advanced electric power network,2.Scope and important items associated with electric power network planning,3.	Load characteristic variations analysis and load growth forecasting,4.Factors and related conditions to be considered for the advanced electric power network planning,5.Construction of the model of optimal advanced electric power network planning,6.The study of the solution space and searching methods for optimal advanced electric power network planning,7.The features of Taiwan electric

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換 2.         機械手臂運動學 3.         機械手臂反向運動學 4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力 5.         機械手臂動力學 6.         軌跡規劃 7.         機械手臂控制 8.         機器視覺 9.         工業自動化應用 10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

notes: 排進修部教室，限 30 人

description.zh: 新興數位學習媒體的開發日新月異，再加上資訊存取的高效能數位化，使得科技輔助的數位學習之路更形寬廣、開闊。電子書於知識傳遞的介面上，扮演了關鍵性的角色。傳統上以行為理論推衍而來的人機介面學習模式已然過於狹隘，因為數位時代中的學習者角色已由被動轉為主動，由行為導向轉為認知導向、意義導向以及脈絡導向，而資訊的解讀與詮釋更從單一性、制式化轉為開放性、多元化。對於致力於創新數位學習科技的開發者而言，針對學習者的學習模式重新加以審視是極為迫切的，如此方能以嶄新的角度去開發新的學習潛能和發展性。本課程目的即是從心理學、認知科學及資訊處理的角度來探討新型數位學習模式以及其應用方法，並探討數位學習成效評估系統的建立方案，形塑電子書於知識鴻海的無限可能。
description.en: The rapid development of digital learning and emerging learning technologies, as well as effective information storage platforms, have made traditional learning theory insufficient and less productive in guiding instructional designs for contemporary educational development. New available learning technologies therefore call for the need to re-consider new learning theories. For that, the definitions and mechanism of learning and learners have become more multidimensional and open-ended, instead of being singular and standardized in conventional perception. For those who are devoted to create new technological applications for learning, it is no doubt critical to construct new mechanism of learning in current highly digitized era. This course will discuss relevant cognitive learning theories from research in psychology and education, and contemplate how new e-learning solutions can be evaluated.

notes: 排進修部教室，限 30 人

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋了基於各種檢測模式 (如化學修飾、電化學、光學與半導體科技) 的化學與生醫感測器的基礎知識以及利用電子元件感測生理訊號。 主題包括感測原理、常見的化學感測器、生物感測器、選擇策略、元件設計以及醫療保健、環境監測和工業等領域的應用。課程安排除了感測器文獻之相關課堂討論之外，也會安排學者講座。學生參加所有講座和參加課堂討論是課程的必修部分。
description.en: This course covers the fundamentals of chemical sensors and biosensors based on chemical modifications, electrochemistry, spectroscopy, semiconductor technologies, and physiological electrical signal measurements. Topics include sensing principles, commonly used sensors, strategies for achieving selectivity and adequate limits of detection, design of devices, and applications in health care, environmental monitoring, industry, and military areas. Articles from the current literature are discussed. We will also invite researchers to introduce current research. Active student participation is expected as an integral part of the course.

notes: 請安排 PBL 教室；限 25 人；大四、化工、生化及半導體碩班

description.zh: 專利文件是最具價值的技術研發資訊。課程除了介紹專利相關基礎知識之外，並以有效的專利檢索分析技藝洞悉未來技術趨勢，特別是針對化學工程、生物科技、生醫材料、智能程序工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米材料等系所研究發展領域的專利文件。透過有系統的分析及視覺化的圖示呈現企業有用的專利情報 (intelligence)，並找到其中潛在的商業利益。
description.en: Patent documents are the most valuable technology research and development information. In addition to introducing the basic knowledge of patents, the course also uses effective patent retrieval and analysis techniques to gain insight into future technological trends. The technical fields of patent documents are especially aimed at chemical engineering, biotechnology, biomedical materials, chemical process and intelligent engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductors and nanomaterials. Present the useful patent intelligence of enterprises through systematic analysis and visual diagrams, and try to find the potential commercial benefits.

name.zh: 化工類專利分析與策略運用
name.en: Analysis and strategic application of chemical engineering patents

description.zh: 電腦模擬是解決現今工程問題不可或缺之工具，但常用的商業模擬軟體不但價格昂貴，其功能常不足以應付前瞻研究所需。本課程旨在培養學生設計專業領域之模擬程式與分析工具的能力，強化軟體開發工程實務的素養。課程訓練分兩階段進行：第一階段確認學生具備基本程式設計能力。首先使其熟悉 Linux 平台及開源軟體的使用，運行不須理論基礎的簡易粒子模擬，針對收集到的數據進行統計分析，資料視覺化，資料定量分析及洞察等任務。以任務導向的學習方式，刺激同學針對特定問題和需求而快速擬定演算法，系統性地解決問題。第二階段將模擬工具開發的能力應用在各科系的專業上。在進行短暫的文獻回顧後，與修課學生討論其專業領域中可用模擬解決或加速的學術研究及產業問題。針對主題制定計畫內容後，以選定的程式語言撰寫相關的應用程式，並以開發成開源軟體為最終目標。註一、課程函授上以 GNU Fortran 和 Python3 為主要程式語言選擇，但學生可自由選擇所熟悉的語言作為工具。註二、修課基本條件為修畢工程學院各系一年級程式設計相關之基礎課程，且具基本撰寫程式的能力。
description.en: This course aims to provide complete training for developing modeling and simulation tools in engineering applications. Students will obtain the ability to analyze problems, formulate algorithms, write code, and implement the developed open-source programs in their fields of study. The first part of the training focuses on task-oriented coding experiences. Students will get familiar with the Linux platform and open-source programs. They will perform simple, particle-based simulations. The collected data will be analyzed, visualized, and interpreted based on the programs written by students.The second part of the training applies the coding knowledge to students’ fields of study. After the literature survey, students will select the topic based on theirexpertise, where research or industrial problems can be accelerated by computer modeling. The final goal is to create software based on the course project.

name.en: Development of Simulation Tools  for Engineering

notes: 大研合開，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 博士班必修

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 網路預選限 60 人；核心七選二；化工所 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 網路預選限 40 人；計中電腦教室，化工所

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

notes: 限 20 人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一；限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程探討無線通訊系統基頻演算法設計，主要包含多輸入多輸出傳輸系統中接收端與傳送端之聯合最佳化問題。課程綱要：1. 基本矩陣運算 2. 多輸入多輸出接收機設計 3. 多輸入多輸出天線選擇 4. 多輸入多輸出前置編碼器設計
description.en: This course aims at the baseband algorithm design for wireless communication systems. Much attention will be focused on the joint multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transceiver optimization.Course outline:1.Basic matrix operations.2.MIMO receiver design.3.MIMO antenna selection.4.MIMO precoder design.

description.zh: 電影、電視、漫畫書、視頻遊戲等其他藝術形式對於塑造人類文化和日常生活的影響力日益增加。本課程旨在藉由觀看電影、電視等其他形式的流行文化，來探索東西方流行文化在過去及現代的本質與意義。
description.en: Alternative forms of art – movies, television, comic books, video games – have become increasingly influential in shaping our culture and our daily lives. By watching films, televisions, and other forms of pop culture, this class explores the nature and significance of pop culture in the past, modern time of the West and East.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限碩二選課

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2. 雷射基本原理  3. 各種雷射介紹  4. 雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

notes: 機電所和半導體碩班合開

description.zh: Z - 轉換、取樣資料系統、等效於連續函數的數位濾波器設計、使用轉換技術設計數位控制系統、使用狀態空間設計數位控制系統、電腦控制。
description.en: Z-Transform, Sampled-Data Systems, Discrete Equivalents to Continuous Transfer Functions: The Digital Filter, Design of Digital Control Systems Using Transform Techniques, Design of Digital Control Systems Using State-Space Methods, Application and Practice of Digital Control, Case Study.

notes: 限 50 人

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

notes: 2 週，機電所。製科所。機電博含外生班合開；限 20 人【停開】

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用 3D 繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

notes: 3/3 停開，一週【停開】

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 研究討論 - 電力電子工程

notes: 限電力電子組碩二及博班 (乙)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

notes: 與 IMBA 合開

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 限博士班學生修課；製科博和機電博含外生合開，限 10 人

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學施工安全與災害方面之基礎，以為將來投身土木建築工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含：擋土開挖、基礎施工、假設工程、結構主體工程、裝修工程、山坡地等施工安全與災害防制等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover:  Safety and disaster preclusion of  opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering   etc.

notes: 土木 205

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學施工安全與災害方面之基礎，以為將來投身土木建築工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含：擋土開挖、基礎施工、假設工程、結構主體工程、裝修工程、山坡地等施工安全與災害防制等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover:  Safety and disaster preclusion of  opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering   etc.

notes: 1 週【停開】

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

notes: 上限 15 人 / 土木 505

description.zh: 基本或然率，可靠度概念與定義，不確定性分析，可靠度分析之方法，可靠度導向設計，系統可靠度。
description.en: The analyses of structure reliability   Basic,the concept and definition of reliability uncertain analyses, the method of reliable analyses , reliability -orient design , system reliability.

notes: 土木 208

description.zh: 本門科目主要為介紹隨機震動學基本理論、頻譜分析與小波分析理論。主要的授課內容涵蓋基本統計理論、隨機訊號定義、期望值與相關函數、傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉、功率頻譜密度函數、頻譜分析、非定常訊號判斷、基礎小波分析等。配合結構動力學，本科目亦講授結構系統受到隨機外力作用而產生之結構反應的頻率域動力分析應用及小波分析應用等範例。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the basics of random vibration, spectral and wavelet analysis. The schedule includes those topics such as fundamental theories of statistics, definition of random signals, expectation and correlation functions, Fourier transform and F.F.T., power spectral density, spectral analysis, non-stationarity judgement, and basic theories of wavelet analysis. To harmony with Dynamics of Structures, this course also introduces examples of dynamic analysis of structural systems excited by random loadings in the frequency domain and applications of wavelet analysis.

name.zh: 隨機震動學與時頻分析
name.en: Introduction to Random Vibration and Time-Frequency-Domain Analysis

notes: 土木 208

description.zh: 工程進度規劃與控制是營建工程進行專案管理時之重要知識與技術，此課程包含 ADM 及 PDM 網圖、要徑分析、PERT 分析、趕工計畫、及實獲值分析等理論知識，同時也會結合工程進度控管軟體應用技術。本課程目標意在培養同學具備工程進度規劃與控制觀念知識，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備工程進度規劃與控制能力。
description.en: Construction project scheduling and control is necessary and important for effective management of construction projects. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for construction project schedule scheduling and control. The course includes plan and analysis of ADM and PDM networks, analysis of critical paths,, plan for catch-up, introduction of PERT and earned value analysis methods. The course will teach students the major concept and methods of construction project scheduling and control. Furthermore, the course will enhance students abilities and techniques integrated with project practices and project schedule software uses.

notes: 土木 208

description.zh: 資訊檢索（Information Retrieval）是搜尋引擎背後的技術基礎，以給定的查詢詞彙找出帶有相關資訊的文件，能夠處理與比較未結構化或半結構化的文字資料。在人工智慧與機器學習技術飛越成長的當代，自然語言處理（Natural Language Processing）及文本探勘（Text Mining）輔助人們在散亂的文本當中發掘有意義的資訊。傳統的資訊檢索理論在文本探勘的任務當中則扮演了重要的輔助角色，其賦與將文件以向量表達的基礎，亦即使諸多人工智慧應用能夠順利的與文本探勘任務接軌。本課程將教導修課同學資訊檢索、自然語言處理與資料探勘的理論基礎，以及各種新穎的人工智慧與機器學習應用如何取代傳統方法。並且訓練修課同學使用現成的程式語言套件來分析自己手邊的文本資料。
description.en: Information Retrieval (IR) is the process that retrieves the information which is relevant to a specific information need from a data collection. Search engine systems provides a famous example of IR applications. In recent years, with the growth of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing (NLP), many of the AI applications can help discover useful information in unstructured or semi-structured text collections, such a process is called Text Mining. The traditional IR technique also play an important role to support the AI applications. It can vectorize the texts and make it possible to compare the similarities between different pieces of text.This course aims to train the enrolled students to learn the basic concept of IR, NLP, and AI applications which are relevant to Text Mining tasks. In addition, this course also trains the enrolled students to use existing tools and software packages which can support the AI applications.

name.zh: 資訊檢索與人工智慧應用

notes: 土木 208

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程管理之架構為主要核心，進階探討工程執行生命週期中之重點管理工作，並透過相關案例之研討，探討工程實務運作上之問題及管理對策。課程內容主要包含營建工程專案管理概念，營建管理方法，工程執行方式與管理策略，工程契約管理，工程爭議處理，工程界面管理等內容。
description.en: 英課名：Construct manage special discuss      1.Manage summary and make tactics.      2.Investigation manage key element analyze.      3.Engineering economy and financial affairs manage.      4.Construction procreation might analyze.      5.Construction risk manage.      6.Value engineering.      7.Engineering contract analyze.      8.Engineering disputes handle.      9.Construct automation and industrialization.     10.BOT and new way of purchasing mode.     11.Construct electron business affairs and construct         information manage.     12.Electric network technology.     13.Engineering resource manage.     14.Engineering insurance and guarantee.     15.Construct affairs administration.     16.Engineering plan proposal and analyze.     17.Communicate and crisis handle.     18.Safety sanitation, environmental protection and         neighbor loss mange.     19.Engineering laws and regulations.     20.Construct investigation manage.

description.zh: 本課程專為有興趣透過數理模擬方法來提升集水區管理技能的學生而設計。課程內容提供了對集水區水文系統內水文過程和水質模擬所使用的原理機制和方法的全面理解。修習本課程需具備水文學和環境科學及工程的基礎知識。學生將探索多種數理模擬工具和技術，以模擬水文和水質對不同環境條件和土地利用衝擊的回應。此外，學生還需學習一些盛行的水文和水質模式並將其應用到現實場景中，以實施有效的水資源管理。本課程旨在使學生掌握必要的知識和技能，以模擬和分析水文過程及水質動態，這對於有效的水資源管理至關重要。
description.en: This course, designed for students who are interested in watershed management, will enhance their skills through modeling analysis.  It provides a comprehensive understanding of the principles and methodologies used in hydrologic processes and water quality modeling within watershed hydrologic system.  Fundamentals and basics of hydrologic and environmental science and engineering is prerequired for taking the course.  Students will explore various modeling tools and techniques that simulate hydrologic and water quality responses to different environmental conditions and land-use practices.  In addition, students are expected to learn and apply some prevailing hydrologic and water quality models to real-world scenarios for effective water resource management.  This course aims to equip students with the knowledge and skills necessary to model and analyze hydrologic processes and water quality dynamics, which are critical for effective water resource management.

name.zh: 集水區水文暨水質模擬
name.en: Watershed-Scaled Hydrologic and Water Quality Modeling

notes: 土木 308

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 丙丁戊組

description.zh: 本課程探討現今積體電路製程相關議題，並討論解決方法與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深包含製程模組如：晶圓製備、氧化、黃光微影、擴散、蝕刻、薄膜沉積、後段製程等，並深入探討為因應元件持續微縮而提出之先進製程整合技術。學生可了解半導體產業的應用，以作為進入半導體、光電、感測器等相關產業的先備知識。
description.en: This course will introduce the semiconductor processing, including device basics, process flow, manufacturing, and process integration. The students will gain a thorough overview on semiconductor manufacturing technology before working in industry.

name.en: Special Topics in VLSI Processing Technology

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 材料所、半導體碩班和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 納入「都市微氣候」的考量，是現階段精進建築設計與提升建築效能的關鍵手段之一；回饋在生活舒適度的感受、居住安全度的維護以及省能節電度的落實等面相，都可得到具體且顯著的成效。掌握都市微氣候的特徵型態與變化脈動，擬判對建築安排可能肇致的影響及干擾，透過自然循環的流場機制及量場管制，找到本土建築規劃之最佳改善設計策略。
description.en: Bringing the “Urban Microclimate” into consideration is one of the key methods to enhance architectural design and upgrade building effectiveness at the present time; it can get feedbacks in many aspects such as feelings of cozy life, maintenance of residential safety , and to carry out the energy-saving.  Holding the features and changes of the Urban Microclimate, analyzing the potential affect and disturb for architecture, through the control mechanism of natural circulation in order to find the best strategy for local design enhancement.

name.en: The Architecture and the Urban Microclimate

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions

name.zh: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
name.en: Urban Land Use Planning and Growth Management

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

notes: 新聘兼任謝坤學老師

description.zh: 「天然生物材料特論」旨在探討天然材料在生物系統中的結構、性質與應用。隨著對生物系統的深入研究，科學家逐步發現天然材料擁有優異的性能，如自我修復、抗菌、生物相容性等。本課程將介紹天然生物材料的最新研究進展及其在工程領域的應用，包括生物高分子、生物材料的製備技術及其在醫學、環保及工業中的潛力。本課程涵蓋以下四大主題：（1）天然生物材料概述、（2）天然材料的基本結構單元、（3）天然材料的生物功能及應用、（4）天然材料的仿生與生物製造技術。
description.en: “Natural Biomaterials” is designed to explore the structures, properties, and applications of natural materials in biological systems. Scientists have discovered that natural materials possess outstanding features such as self-repair, antimicrobial properties, and biocompatibility. This course will introduce the latest research developments in natural biomaterials and their applications in engineering fields, including biopolymers, biofabrication, and the potential uses in medical, environmental, and industrial domains. The topics covered in this course will include (1) an overview of natural biomaterials, (2) fundamental building blocks of natural materials, (3) biological functions and applications, and (4) bioinspired and biofabrication technologies.

notes: 生化所和化工所合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: Second grade

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程著重於 IC 製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC 絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC 技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

notes: 機電。製科。半導體專班。外生班合開；限 50 人

description.zh: 本課程介紹了創新的本質、企業創新的原因以及如何管理創新。課程內容程涵蓋有關創新管理的一系列主題，包括創新動機、企業如何利用知識產權（如專利和商標）保護其創新、“研究與開發”（R&D )、創意人員、流程和團隊的管理，產品、服務和體驗創新的管理，“開放式創新” 的採用和使用，以及創新中模塊化的採用和使用。本課程在科技管理的部分主要介紹科技管理廠商層次 (micro-level) 與總體層次 (macro-level) 的相關理論，研究的領域與相關學術期刊。廠商層次介紹開放式創新、創業管理、智慧財產管理、資源論、技術搜尋、產業組織論等。在總體層次介紹科技政策的範疇與相關理論，包括技術典範與軌跡、國家、產業與區域創新系統、服務創新、科技計量與指標與產學合作政策等。課程內容包括以案例研究為重點的討論，其中混合使用虛實的公司來討論管理創新的各個面向。這些討論與課程中涵蓋的主題互補，並以加強用予實際應用的想法。透過本課程，學生可以對碩 / 博士論文的研究課題，能有正確且有效地構建文獻探討的能力。
description.en: This course introduces the nature of innovation, why firms innovate, and how innovation can be managed. The lectures cover a range of topics concerning the management of innovation, including motivations for innovating, how firms can protect their innovations using intellectual property rights (such as patents and trademarks), the nature and organization and management of “research and development” (R&D), the management of creative people, processes and teams, the management of product, service and experience innovations, the adoption and use of “open innovation”, and the adoption and use of modularity in innovation.  This course introduces the micro-level and macro-level of technology management with respect to related theories, research field and academic journal. The micro-level comprises open innovation, entrepreneurial management, management of intellectual property, resource-based view, technology search, industrial organization, etc. The macro-level consists of the extent

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

notes: 余相賓 2

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹先進光學材料 (包含光電半導體、奈米晶體、二維材料、有機光電材料與液晶等) 的特性及其在雷射技術中的應用，包括相關材料的性能與製備、光學量測設備以及相關雷射應用的案例。透過此課程，學生將學習新的光學材料之光電物理特性，掌握雷射技術的基本原理並評估不同光學材料在雷射應用中的可能性。
description.en: This course provides a systematic introduction to the properties of advanced optical materials, such as optoelectronic semiconductors, nanocrystals, two-dimensional materials, organic optoelectronic materials, and liquid crystals, as well as their applications in laser technology. The course covers the performance analysis and fabrication methods of these materials, the operating principles of optical measurement instruments, and real-world applications through various laser technology case studies. Through this course, students will gain a solid understanding of the optoelectronic properties of advanced optical materials, comprehend the fundamental principles and mechanisms of laser technology, and develop the ability to evaluate the potential of different optical materials for laser applications.

name.zh: 先進光電材料與雷射應用
name.en: Advanced Photonic Materials and laser application

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。
description.en: This course will introduce (1)characteristic features of surfactant and its preparation (2)adsorption of surface-active agents at interfaces (3)micelle formation by surfactants (4)modification of surface properties by surfactants (5)foaming and antifoaming by aqueous solutions of surfactants.

name.zh: 界面活性劑原理與應用
name.en: The Principles and Applications of Surface Active Agent

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 本課程包括傳統地質研究、工程地質調查應用、能源地質介紹、環境地質調查應用、GIS 在地質之應用等。
description.en: This course includes traditional geological research, application of engineering geological survey, introduction to energy geology, application of environmental geological survey, application of GIS in geology, etc.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

notes: 限 25 人，製科所和半導體碩班合開

description.zh: 在諸多工程應用實例中，如 LED、晶片之散熱問題、流體在能源系統中之熱交換、燃料電池衍生之熱問題等，都與材料之規格選用、處理方法、加工方式、製造過程有明顯的相關性。本門課程主要針對材料工程與熱管理相關的技術問題，提出探討與對策，期使學生對熱管理在材料與系統工程上的應用提供適當的專業知識。
description.en: In engineering applications, such as LED, chip cooling, heat exchange in energy systems, fuel cells, are always comes with the problems of thermal generation. Meanwhile, manufacturing process and heat treatment of these products are also strongly dependent of the selection of material specifications. The purpose of this course would like to employ practical problems and lead the students in finding appropriate solutions or technical approaches to solve the related problems they could meet.

name.zh: 材料特性與熱管理實務應用

notes: 機電所。自動外生。機電博含外生專班合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括 GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

notes: 經管所和 IMBA 合開

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: {教室：三教 309}

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

notes: {教室：綜科 327}

description.zh: 本課程探討的內容涵蓋國際金融基本觀念、架構、理論與應用，課程內容包括：匯率、外匯市場 (即期、遠期、外匯期貨和外匯選擇權市場)、國際收支與國際貨幣制度、國際收支調整理論和均衡匯率決定理論等。同時討論國際金融環境的變化、多國籍企業如何規避匯率風險、開放經濟下的總體經濟政策等議題。此門課的修習除了有助於了解國際金融相關知識外，並可以培養對國際金融與匯兌問題之思考、探討、批判與洞察能力。
description.en: This course provides the introduction to the workings of the foreign exchange markets, the impact of economic policy on exchange rates, the nature of foreign exchange risk, and the effects of various international economic policies on domestic and world welfare. The course content will include balance of payments, determination of foreign exchange rates, and international monetary system, and cover the following topics: foreign exchange market; the interest rate parity theorem; exchange rates and inflation; purchasing power parity; balance of payments and national income accounting; the determination of the exchange rate.  In addition, we focus on how multinational corporations manage their exchange rate risk, and how they make sound investment and financing decisions factoring exchange rate fluctuations.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程，其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 功率級電路 3. 轉換器架構與分析 4. 控制電路 5. 回授電路 6. 保護電路 7. 電路佈局與機構 8. 應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

notes: 預選 20 人

description.zh: 這門課程深入探討將 AI 技術直接整合至硬體的過程。課程從 AI 晶片的基本概念開始，進一步探討各種 AI 的數位、類比及混合訊號架構。課程內容涵蓋了對神經網路模型映射到晶片硬體的過程及優化。重要的一環是神經網路編譯器的設計與優化，並輔以實務工具和考量以實現高效的 AI 晶片設計。課程還探討了 AI 晶片的當前應用及 AI 硬體發展的未來趨勢。課程以學生專題為導向，將所學知識應用於創新的 AI 晶片解決方案。此課程旨在為學生提供在不斷進化的 AI 硬體領域中取得成功所需的技能和知識。
description.en: This course, titled "AI-on-Chip Design: Architectures and Applications," offers a deep dive into how AI technologies are integrated directly onto hardware. It begins with fundamental concepts of AI-on-Chip, moving into the intricacies of digital, analog, and mixed-signal architectures tailored for AI applications. The curriculum includes a thorough examination of neural network models, focusing on their optimization and the critical process of mapping these models onto hardware. A significant portion is dedicated to the design and optimization of neural network compilers, supplemented by practical insights into the tools and considerations necessary for efficient AI chip design. The course also explores current applications of AI-on-Chip and anticipates future trends that could reshape AI hardware development. It culminates in a project presentation where students apply what they've learned to create innovative AI-on-Chip solutions. This course equips students with the skills and knowl

name.zh: 人工智慧晶片設計與應用

description.zh: 此門課程的主要目標，將介紹數位多媒體晶片設計，讓學生對於數位多媒體晶片設計有深入的認識與了解，進而產生濃厚的興趣與設計能力。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in digital multimedia IC design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction 2. Digital IC Design3. Color Science4. Multimedia System   a. Image and Video Coding  b. State-of-the-art Image and Video Coding Standards (industry)  c. 3D Video System  d. Holographic System5. Multimedia IC Design Methodology

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路，進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 電源管理 IC 設計簡介 2. 電壓參考電路設計 3. 低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4. 交換式電壓調整器 5. 交換電容電源轉換器 6. 電池充電技術與應用 7. 設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線 2. 散射參數 3. 微波主動元件 4. 寬頻放大電路 5. 低雜訊放大電路 6. 功率放大器 7. 高穩定振盪器 8. 壓控振盪器 9. 鎖相迴路 10. 混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 機器學習探討如何能由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能自動增進其處理效能。例如進行預測，特徵擷取，分類，模式辨認，決策，各種訊號處理，甚至建立人工智慧等等。本課程將介紹機器學習的基礎演算法、理論及工具。並讓學生嘗試在各種領域中實際實踐這些技術。課程內容包括：(a) 監督式學習（例如參數和非參數演算法、支持向量機和類神經網路等），(b) 無監督學習（例如群聚、降維和深度學習等）與 (c) 機器學習應用實例（例如語音信號處理，影像訊號處理，音訊訊號處理與自然語言處理，資訊擷取與資料搜尋等）。
description.en: Machine learning studies how to automatically learn from observed data to improve the performance of prediction, information extraction, clustering, pattern recognition, decision making, signal processing and even artificial intelligence. This course will introduce fundamental algorithms, theories and their practical applications. The content will cover (a) supervised learning, such as parametric and non-parametric algorithms, super vector machines and neural networks, (b) unsupervised learning, for example, data clustering, dimension reduction and deep learning and (c) practical applications on speech, image, audio signal and natural language processing or information retrieval and search, etc.

notes: 電子所和 AI 班合開

description.zh: 1. 天線基礎 2. 長導線天線 3. 孔徑型天線 4. 陣列分析與合成 5. 自阻抗與互阻抗 6. 信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 在過去的 60 年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全 NP

Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

notes: 電子所。電資外生.AI 所。鐵道班合開

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 影像簡介， 2. 顏色空間， 3. 類比影像介面， 4. 數位影像介面， 5. 數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9. 數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線理論 2. 等量傳輸網路之合成 3. 集體元件微波電路 4. 半集總濾波電路之合成 5. 耦合傳輸線之物理參數 6. 耦合傳輸線濾波器 7. 指狀濾波器 8. 梳型濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line theory2.Synthesis of commensurate line networks3.Lumped element microwave circuits4.Synthesis of semi-lumped filter curcuits5.Physical parameters of coupled lines6.Coupled lines filter7.Interdigital filter8.Combline filter

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

description.zh: 基礎承載力理論與分析，基礎沈陷量分析 (彈性與壓密)，基礎施工，安全監測，專題討論，大地資訊系統之應用。
description.en: Advanced foundation engineering  Basic load theory and analysis ,basic settlement analysis, foundation construction,safety supervise , special subject discussion and application of geography information system.

notes: 蔣榮老師 / 土木 208

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

notes: 先鋒 1402 教室

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生了解現今專利權授予上較具爭議之課題。透過案例閱讀與討論，除使學生明白專利熱門議題外，也了解未來專利之發展趨勢。
description.en: The course provides some important issues, including animal and plant patents, traditional knowledge and genetic resources, computer software, business methods, as well as some recent cases, such as Apple sued HTC.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關程序規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請文件、分割與改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹專利迴避設計之觀念與實務練習。
description.en: This course will introduce the procedural regulations for patent applications and other patent-related matters, such as filing documents, divisional applications, amendments, patent assignments, and oppositions, along with the procedural requirements that must be met. Additionally, the course will cover the concept and practical exercises for patent design-around strategies.

name.zh: 專利程序審查與專利迴避設計
name.en: Patent application procedures and patent design around

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink 簡介 2. 控制系統建模 3. 線性時變控制系統分析 4. 可觀測性與可控制性 5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析 6. 曲線擬合與系統建模 7. 控制器設計 8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

notes: 綜科 511

description.zh: 資訊安全保險相關事故的理賠調查，使得數位鑑識在金融或資訊領域的重要性日益提升。數位鑑識與調查課程主要說明如何找到入侵或犯罪留下的可能的足跡，並介紹如何在合法與符合鑑識程序規範的前提下蒐集足夠的證據並保護這些有用的證據，以做為未來訴訟有效的佐證。在課程的設計上將以數位鑑識相關國際證照的領域與內容為主，除了教授學生數位鑑識的專業知識外，期能輔導學生取得數位鑑識相關證照。
description.en: The cyber security incident investigation for the cyber insurance has made digital forensics more and more important in the financial or information industry. This course focuses on identifying possible footprints of intrusions or crimes and collecting sufficient evidence and protect such useful evidence in order to be effective in future litigation. In the design of the course, the domain and content of the digital forensics international certification licenses will be mainly used. In addition to teaching the professional knowledge of digital forensics, it can also help the students obtain digital forensics certification in the future.

notes: 資財所和創新資安合開

description.zh: 區塊鏈和數位資產是未來金融和科技領域的重要趨勢之一，本課程將介紹區塊鏈以及數位資產的基本知識與原理，並探討如何利用區塊鏈以及比特幣技術搭建新型態的金融基礎設施與永續的生態系統，內容包含 (1) 區塊鏈基礎；(2) 比特幣運作原理；(3) 穩定幣等數位資產；(4) 比特幣進階，含閃電網路、側鏈、智能合約層、永續挖礦… 等；(5) 實體世界資產 (RWA，Real World Asset)；(6) 區塊鏈分析；(7) 法規與監管… 等，為參與課程的學生建立正確的區塊鏈與數位資產的觀念。
description.en: Blockchain and Digital Asset are one of the important trends in the future of finance and technology. This course will introduce the basic knowledge and principles of blockchain and digital assets, as well as explore how to use blockchain and Bitcoin technology to build a new type of financial infrastructure and sustainable ecosystem, the content includes (1) Blockchain basics; (2) Bitcoin operating principles; (3) Digital assets such as stable coins; (4) Bitcoin advanced including Lightning Network, Rootstock, Stacks, sustainable mining...etc. (5) Real World Asset (RWA); (6) Blockchain analysis; (7) Regulations and supervision... etc., to establish a correct concept of blockchain and digital assets for students participating in the course.

notes: 哈佛講堂，資財四甲資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程將延續財務工程導論的內容，將持續在衍生性商品評價、避險以及風險控管等問題上繼續深入探討；本學期將把焦點放在股票衍生性商品與利率衍生性商品的評價與避險上，並利用 C (或 C++) 和 Matlab 兩種工具來執行 (1) 樹狀結構 (2) 蒙地卡羅法 以評價選擇權的價值。
description.en: This course will still focus on the methods for derivatives pricing and hedging, such as the evaluation of stock and interest rate options. For implementation purposes associated with the concepts introduced, such as the tree structure and Monte Carlo simulation, two programming languages for computation will be provided: C (or C++ ) and Matlab.

notes: 資財四甲資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 一般教室，限 40 人，日碩 / 外碩 / 創新所 / 設計博合開

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工 (超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM 的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

notes: 職機電 / 製科合開，綜科 110-1, 時間異動 (一) or (五) A-C 節

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

notes: 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

notes: 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

notes: 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 本課程旨在概述人工智慧的應用及其對製造業和物流業的影響。 隨機器學習、深度學習、啟發式演算法和其他人工智能方法的發展，相關新興技術的應用越來越多地被應用於製造和物流行業以提高決策能力。本課程將通過介紹人工智慧的基礎知識和實際應用之案例研究闡述使用人工智慧技術對於產業決策之幫助。學生將深入了解人工智慧技術及其在製造和物流領域如需求預測、生產計劃、調度、質量控製或運輸的潛在應用，課程內容亦將應用 ChatGPT 做為開發製造物流問題求解方法之輔助工具。通過本課程，學生將了解人工智慧對製造和物流系統之影響及現況，評估使用人工智慧之益處和局限性，並了解人工智慧對於相關產業之改善。
description.en: This course provides an overview of AI application and its impact on manufacturing and logistics. Emerging technologies like machine learning, deep learning, heuristics are being utilized to enhance decision-making capabilities. The course covers the fundamentals of AI, practical case studies, and its benefits. Latest AI technologies and their potential applications in manufacturing and logistics such as demand forecasting, production planning, scheduling, quality control, or transportation will be introduced. ChatGPT will be used as an auxiliary tool for developing problem-solving methods. The course develops the ability to analyze the impact of AI on manufacturing and logistics systems, assess benefits and limitations, and evaluate AI improvement for related industries.

name.zh: 人工智慧跨域製造及物流之應用
name.en: AI Applications in Manufacturing and Logistic

notes: 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

notes: 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。再者，本課程以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構。將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. Furthermore, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. It can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

notes: 實體與遠距教學

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修

description.zh: 銲接冶金課程深入研究金屬銲接技術與冶金過程，培養學生在材料處理和銲接技術方面的專業能力。課程包括銲接方法、銲材選擇、熱影響、金屬結構與性能及銲接缺陷等內容，並結合實際案例，使學生能理解並應用於工程實務。
description.en: The welding metallurgy course in the graduate program delves into metal welding techniques and metallurgical processes, cultivating students' expertise in material handling and welding technologies. The curriculum covers welding methods, selection of welding materials, heat-affected zones, metal structures and properties, welding defects, and incorporates real-world cases to enable students to comprehend and apply them in engineering practice.

notes: 機電所、製科所、外生專班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 機電所、製科所、自動化所合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程就電磁波應用在微波遙測領域做介紹，內容包含電磁波散射理論，隨機散射，輻射轉移方程及分層介質，進而延伸到應用層面對雪地，植披，土壤粗糙面及海洋模型的探討。
description.en: This course introduces the application of electromagnetic waves in the field of microwave remote sensing. The content includes electromagnetic wave scattering theory, random scattering, radiative transfer equations, and layered media, extending to the application aspects of models for snow, vegetation, soil, and ocean.

name.en: Electromagnetic scattering model in remote sensing

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理 (關聯群 3)

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理【停開】

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

notes: (群組 5) 創新與創業管理

description.zh: 本課程將以團隊合作模式進行三項活動競賽 (寰騰動、寰騰撼、寰騰賽)。課程設計為兩天的內容：包括 1. 隊呼競賽 2. 闖關活動 3. 哈佛個案競賽以呼應 EMBA 應具備的四到 (學到、交到、玩到、做到)。
description.en: This course is to develop the ability to lead business transformation and team building in the dynamic economic environment. There are three parts in this course: 1. Cheerleading contest 2. Team building activities 3. Harvard Business School case contest. The goals of this course are four must does in EMBA( to Learn, Make friends, practice, and achieve).

name.en: 本課程將以團隊合作模式進行三項活動競賽(寰騰動、寰騰撼、寰騰賽)。課程設計為兩天的內容:包括1.隊呼競賽2

notes: 碩二必修

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、TOPSIS、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices.

notes: 碩二必修

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

notes: 碩二必修

description.zh: 培養學生使用多通道波束形成器技術應用在降噪、降混響，並使用 Matlab 撰寫多通道語音增強演算法。學生可以學習到: 1. 空間取樣概念。2. 延遲相加波束形成器技術。3. 最小變異無失真響應波束形成器技術。4. 線性限制最小變異波束形成器技術。5. 廣義旁辦消除波束形成器技術。6. 多通道維也納濾波器降噪降混響技術。7. 線性卡爾曼濾波器結和廣義旁辦消除波束形成器技術。
description.en: Students will learn to use multichannel beamformer techniques and Matlab for speech enhancement. Students will learn: 1. Spatial sampling concept. 2. Delay-and-sum (DAS) beamforming technique. 3. Minimum variance distortionless response (MVDR) beamforming technique. 4. Linearly constraint minimum variance (LCMV) beamforming technique. 5. Generalized sidelobe canceller (GSC) beamforming technique. 6. Multichannel Wiener filtering for denoising and dereverberation. 7. Integrated sidelobe cancellation and linear prediction Kalman filter (ISCLP)

description.zh: 設計方法，材料性質，構件受壓行為，構件受拉行為，構件受撓行為，軸力和彎矩之聯合作用，構件受剪行為，構件受扭行為。
description.en: Behavior of Reinforced Concrete Frame   1.Method of Design2.Properties of Materials3.Compressed Behavior of Frame4.Tension Behavior of Frame5.Flexing Behavior of Frame6.Impact of Axial Force And Moment7.Shear Behavior of Frame8.Torsion Behavior of Frame

name.zh: 鋼筋混凝土構件行為學

notes: 土木 505

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與 EMBA 學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發 EMBA 學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二必修，台北集中上課，國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
description.en: This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧於企業實務之應用
name.en: Application of Generative Artificial Intelligence in Enterprise Practice

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理

description.zh: 這門課將深入探討從巴黎協定到 Net Zero 的全球淨零碳排發展歷程，並闡述碳訂價政策工具的概念與國際主要實踐。透過企業淨零實務分享，學生將了解目標訂定、策略制定、管理制度建立以及追蹤管理等步驟。課程還涵蓋 ISO 14064 碳盤查和 ISO 14067 產品碳足跡的概念與實作，並結合企業減碳經驗分享。最後，課程將介紹數位轉型在碳管理上的應用，包括資訊治理和低碳轉型等技術，旨在培養學生對於全球氣候行動及企業永續發展的深刻理解與實踐能力。
description.en: This course explores the evolution towards global net-zero carbon emissions, from the Paris Agreement to Net Zero, along with the concept and implementation of carbon pricing policies. Through real-world examples, students learn how companies set goals, develop strategies, and establish management systems for achieving net-zero emissions. Additionally, the course covers carbon footprint verification and product carbon footprinting practices, alongside insights from businesses reducing carbon emissions. Finally, it examines the application of digital transformation in carbon management, fostering understanding of climate action and corporate sustainability.

name.zh: 永續發展與淨零碳管理
name.en: Sustainable Development and Net Zero Carbon Management

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (台北上課)

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
