description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在介紹人工智慧技術在各項金融主題的實務應用，內容包括：人工智慧介紹、金融概念介紹、機器人理財、大數據徵信、智慧借貸、5G 金融服務、區塊鏈金融服務、智慧物聯網金融、加密貨幣金融等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the smart finance. Topics include artificial intelligence introduction, finance introduction, robo-advisory, credit analysis, AI lending, 5G financial services, blockchain financial services,  AIoT finance, cryptocurrency finance.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理 (關聯群 6)

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

notes: 博班，工管碩、博班和管理博班合開

description.zh: 半導體黃光微影技術是先進半導體製程的關鍵之一。如何優化曝光的光學系統和成像光阻的化學系統，以及控制顯影成像後的不良粒子缺陷，是決定先進半導體成敗與良率的關鍵。本課程涵蓋黃光微影技術的基本原理、步驟和光阻材料的組成，讓學員獲得整體性概念，了解黃光微影技術在晶圓製造中的角色及其對良率的影響。通過實際案例的介紹與演練，學員能更清楚地掌握專業背景知識並學以致用，培養半導體產業所需的技能，提升未來就業基礎與創新能力。課程將分為三個階段進行。第一階段介紹微影製程的基本原理及光阻材料，幫助學員累積研發與解決問題的專業知識。第二階段通過應用和實戰案例解析，使學員了解產業運作中的實際知識與技巧，並培養從微觀角度理解與思考問題的能力，提升自學效率與興趣。第三階段以模擬演練的方式，協助學員建立問題解決的技巧，增強他們的能力與信心。
description.en: Semiconductor lithography technology is the most crucial step in advanced semiconductor processes. Optimizing the optical system in exposure parameters and the chemical system in resist formulation design, as well as controlling defects in resist and the development step, are crucial for the success of advanced semiconductor production. This course covers the fundamental principles, steps, and composition of lithography technology, providing participants with a comprehensive understanding of the role of lithography in wafer manufacturing. Through practical case studies and exercises, participants can gain a clearer grasp of professional background knowledge and apply it effectively, cultivating the skills required in the semiconductor industry and enhancing future employment foundations and innovation capabilities.

name.zh: 黃光微影製程材料及缺陷控制技術
name.en: The lithography process, materials, and defect control technology

notes: 半導體碩班

description.zh: 電源轉換器 (Power Converter) 設計須滿足高效率及高功率密度的要求，因應此需求需搭配轉換器架構的選用、新型寬能隙元件的應用、高頻磁性元件的設計、柔性切換技術 (Soft Switching Techniques)。在本次課程將會介紹這些技術的原理及設計方法及高效能轉換器的技術核心：變壓器 (Transformer) 與磁性元件的設計要領及寬能隙元件應用的介紹。藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力。
description.en: The design of power converters is being pushed to meet the requirements of high efficiency and high power density. In response to this demand, the selection of converter architecture, the application of new wide bandgap devices, the design of high-frequency magnetic components, and soft switching techniques are needed. This course introduces the principles and design methods of these technologies and the core technical aspects of high-efficiency converters, including the design of transformers and magnetic components, and the application of wide bandgap devices. This course is aimed at graduate students. Students can strengthen their theoretical knowledge and practical ability through theoretical discussion and simulation practice from this course.

name.zh: 進階電源轉換器設計實務
name.en: Advanced Power Converter Design and Practices

notes: 綜科 417, 預選 32 人

description.zh: 太空工程實務專題課程旨在讓學生瞭解和掌握太空工程領域的實踐技能和實務知識，以及培養學生的團隊協作、問題解決和創新思維能力。學生將進行一個實際的太空工程設計項目，通過實踐瞭解太空工程的設計、測試、實施和管理流程，並透過報告、演示和評審等形式展示項目成果。通過此課程的學習，學生可以瞭解太空工程領域的最新發展，掌握相關的技能和知識，並提升團隊合作和項目管理能力。本課程可同時藉由產學合作設計進行實際演練。
description.en: The aim of the Space Engineering Practical Project course is to enable students to understand and master practical skills and knowledge in the field of space engineering, as well as to cultivate their teamwork, problem-solving, and innovative thinking abilities. Students will undertake a practical space engineering design project to understand the design, testing, implementation, and management processes of space engineering through practice, and demonstrate project outcomes through reports, presentations, and assessments. Through this course, students can understand the latest developments in the field of space engineering, master relevant skills and knowledge, and enhance their teamwork and project management abilities. This course can also provide practical exercises through industry-academia collaboration.

notes: 億光 405 教室

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

notes: (群組 4) 行銷管理

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 變分法，積分方程式， Green 函數，高等複變，asymptotic 展開，微擾法
description.en: Calculus of Variations and Application, Integral Equations, Green Function, Advance Complex Variables, Asymptotic Expansion of Integrals, Purturbation Methods

description.zh: 本課程含蓋下列內容 1. 適應性系統之理論與實務 2. 學習與適應之概念 3. 適應性系統之結構及其相關之適應性（訓練）法則 4. 適應性信號處理之應用，包含濾波器設計﹑系統識別，及適應性控制
description.en: 1.Theory and practice of adaptive systems.2.Concepts of learning and adaptation.3.Structure of adaptive system and the related adaptive   algorithms.4.Applications to files design,system identification,and   adaptive control.

notes: 新聘教師

description.zh: 近年來企業為面對市場的競爭與快速改變，其多以大型專案方式同時來執行幾個專案，如：產品研發、行銷規劃、生產製造及教育訓練等專案活動。大型專案管理要如何才能在企業統一的願景和策略下展開，來提升企業的競爭優勢與創造價值。因大型專案的時程較長且範圍較多，其不確定性和混淆性也較高，以致其成功的關鍵除須具備專案的執行的效率外，還須具有在於對變化的反應能力。本課程內容將著重於介紹大型專案規劃流程中所使用的技能與工具說明外，並安排學生企業內大型專案實務案例做為課堂內探討。其目的在訓練學生如何面對高混淆性和高不確定性的大型專案，使企業內大型專案管理有系統的方法執行與圓滿完成。
description.en: Recently, in order to face the challenges and rapid changes of the competition, enterprises often need have a large-scale project to execute several projects at the same time, such as product development, marketing planning, manufacturing, and education and training. How can large-scale project management be carried out under the unified vision and strategy of the enterprise? New capabilities and cultural consensus are needed to enhance the enterprise's competitive advantage and create value. Due to the long duration and large scope of large-scale project, its uncertainty and confusion are also high, so that the key to its success must be not only the efficiency of project execution, but also the ability to respond to changes.This course will focus on introducing the skills and tools used in the large-scale project, and arranging large-scale project practical cases in student companies as classroom discussions. Its purpose is to train students how to deal with large-scale project wit

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (關聯群 3)

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 碩一丙（學號：71 以後）

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋討論光電學之基本應用原理並結合分子生物學之知識 （諸如 脫氧核糖核酸核糖核酸 蛋白質 或細胞的基本結構介紹） 希望能更拓展學員對光電學應用的眼界本課程目標將藉由了解光電探測儀器之操作應用，光源控制，與光源種類之差異（諸如 gamma 射線，X - 射線，UV 光，紅外線與可見光), 進而將之應用於生物分子的觀察，與生命科學應用上，範圍之廣無可界限.
description.en: This course covers optoelectronics combine with biomolecular of knowledge. We will focus on discussing how the DNA, RNA, protein or cells related with optoelectronic application.Optoelectronics is the study and application of electronic devices that source, detect and control light, usually considered a subfield of photonics. The light often includes invisible forms of radiation such as gamma rays, X-rays, ultraviolet and infrared, in addition to visible light, which is based on the quantum mechanical effects of light on semiconducting materials. A biomolecule is any organic molecule that is produced by a living organism, including large polymeric molecules such as proteins, polysaccharides, and nucleic acids as well as small molecules such as primary metabolites, secondary metabolites, and natural products. As organic molecules, biomolecules consist primarily of carbon and hydrogen, nitrogen, and oxygen, and, to a smaller extent, phosphorus and sulfur.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 高分所及 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括：(1) 黏彈性簡介 (2) 時間溫度轉換 (3) 非結晶區之玻璃轉移點 (4) 橡膠理論 (5) 黏彈模型 (6) 介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程介紹複合材料的原理，包括複合材料的高分子化學、複合材料的加工方法、複合材料的力學分析與設計、以及複合材料在高科技上的應用。加工方法包括真空袋成型法、壓力釜成形法、樹脂移送成型、編織法、纏繞成形法、拉擠成型法、模壓法… 等，本課程詳述這些加工方法的原理及應用，同時介紹力學分析及設計，應力和應變之關係，複材之彎曲、靜態和動態之強度、脫層、耐久性、及以力學觀點設計複合材料，最後討論複合材料如何應用於高科技及民生工業上。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the principle and potential application of composite materials. It includes polymer chemistry, design and analysis of composite, and processing methods. The composite processings include autoclaves,vacuum vags, resin transform molding, braiding, filament winding, pultrusions, sheet molding compound,…etc. The principles and application of the methods will be elucidated. The analysis and design, strain-stress relationships, extension and bending, static and dynamic strengths, and delamination, will also be discussed. Finally, the potential application of the composite in high-tech industries will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課內容包括高分子鏈之統計力學、高分子之界面作用力及 Flory-Huggin 理論。 對於紡織技術學程的規劃，本課程會注重紡織纖維的合成技術，例如用奈米技術加在 Nylon 纖維上，例如以 clay 加強 Nylon 的強度及磨耗性質，用理論的探討例如用 Halpin-Tsai equation 去預測紡織纖維的楊氏係數，另外也會加強高分子物理化學在紡織纖維成型過程中所扮演的角色。
description.en: The course includes; statistics of polymer chain, interfacial polymer force, Florry-Huggun theory. A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization, polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition, structures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared. The object of this course is also to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties.

notes: 分子四和高分所合開

description.zh: 太空科技應用課程旨在探討太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，與太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的專題演講與小組討論，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
description.en: The aim of the Space Science & Technology Seminar is to enable students to understand and master practical skills and knowledge in the field of space engineering, as well as to cultivate their teamwork, problem-solving, and innovative thinking abilities. Students will undertake a practical space engineering design project to understand the design, testing, implementation, and management processes of space engineering through practice, and demonstrate project outcomes through reports, presentations, and assessments. Through this course, students can understand the latest developments in the field of space engineering, master relevant skills and knowledge, and enhance their teamwork and project management abilities. This course can also provide practical exercises through industry-academia collaboration.

notes: 億光 405 教室

description.zh: 太空載具動力學與控制課程旨在介紹太空載具的運動學、動力學和控制理論。本課程的主要內容包括：太空載具軌道和運動學、太空載具動力學、太空載具控制系統、太空載具機動、姿態控制和軌道控制、太空載具自主導航、太空載具對接。學生將學習如何建立太空載具的運動學和動力學模型，以及如何設計控制系統來實現載具的各種機動和控制任務。
description.en: The Spacecraft Dynamics and Control course aims to introduce the kinematics, dynamics, and control theory of spacecraft. The main contents of this course include spacecraft orbit and kinematics, spacecraft dynamics, spacecraft control systems, spacecraft maneuvers, attitude and orbit control, autonomous navigation, spacecraft rendezvous and docking. Students will learn how to establish kinematic and dynamic models of spacecraft, as well as how to design control systems to achieve various spacecraft maneuvers and control tasks.

name.zh: 太空載具動力學與控制

notes: 太空所和電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程深入探討低軌道衛星系統和地面站行動通訊網路的整合應用。課程內容包括低軌道衛星的基本原理、系統設計，以及地面站行動通訊網路的架構和技術。學生將透過理論學習和實務操作，深入瞭解這兩個領域的相互關聯性，並學會整合應用這些技術於實際通訊系統。此外，課程亦包涵低軌道衛星系統的運作原理，包括衛星軌道、通訊協定和數據傳輸技術。以及地面站行動通訊網路的設計和運營，涵蓋行動通訊標準、網路架構和協定等方面的知識。課程將以專題形式進行，學生將參與低軌道衛星系統和地面站行動通訊網路的整合專案。透過實作，他們將應用所學的理論知識，設計出具有實用價值的整合系統。最終，本課程的目標是培養學生在低軌道衛星通訊和行動通訊網路整合方面的專業能力，使他們具備未來衛星通訊發展的技術素養。
description.en: This course explores the integration of Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellite systems and ground station mobile communication networks. Topics include LEO satellite principles, system design, and the architecture of ground station mobile communication networks. Through theory and hands-on practice, students gain a deep understanding of these interconnected fields and learn to apply these technologies in real communication systems. The course features project-based learning, allowing students to participate in integrated projects and apply their theoretical knowledge to design practical systems. The ultimate goal is to develop students' professional expertise in integrating LEO satellite communication and mobile networks for future advancements in satellite communication.

name.zh: LEO 與地面站網路整合專題
name.en: LEO and Ground Station Communication Networks

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP 架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP 訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

notes: {教室：綜科 327}

description.zh: 介紹如何開發『資料庫』的應用軟體以結合機械工程應用。內容含：Ubuntu Linux 電腦作業系統，Apache 伺服，MySQL 資料庫伺服，HTML 與 PHP 電腦程式語言，範例剖析。
description.en: The course aims to introduce the applications of database, further to combine them with the applications of mechanical engineering. The introduced contents consist of the following points:1.Ubuntu Linux, 2.Apache Server, 3.MySQL Server, 4.HTML and PHP, 5.Examples Explainations.

notes: 製科所、機電所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

notes: 製科所、機電所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要學習各企業在半導體製程的各關鍵製程，包括晶圓製造、蝕刻及封裝測試等，同時深入探討最先進的半導體製造設備。透過與業界專家交流，使學生了解產業實務案例，並掌握應對半導體產業人才需求。率先引領台灣半導體產業發展以真實具體的企業經驗為教材，進而鼓勵學生追求半導體科技創新的渴望，強化學生對職涯願景的規劃。
description.en: This course focuses on studying the key processes of various companies in the semiconductor manufacturing process, including wafer manufacturing, etching, packaging, and testing, etc., and also provides an in-depth discussion of the most advanced semiconductor manufacturing equipment. Through exchanges with industry experts, students can understand industrial practical cases and master the talent needs of the semiconductor industry. It takes the lead in leading the development of Taiwan's semiconductor industry by using real and concrete corporate experience as teaching materials, thereby encouraging students to pursue semiconductor technology innovation and strengthening students' career vision planning.

name.zh: 企業實務講座 - 半導體製程與設備

notes: 機械四、機電所、製科所合開；{請教務處排 50 人教室}

description.zh: 積層製造技術 (又稱三維列印) 在近十年來試圖改變整個製造技術的生態，已不再是原型的製造與小量生產，它已經達到符合經濟生產效益的經濟規模製造方法。雖然積層製造以加工方法可分為七大分類，但以工程材料分類則以金屬為最具經濟價值與工業應用最為廣泛。因此，本課程主要以金屬積層製造的方法為出發點，說明可以列印金屬的加工方法，以縮短學術與工業應用的距離。在本課程中，也說明金屬三維列印件的材料選用、列印件的設計考量、加工參數優化、列印件的使用壽命檢測、與數值模擬等。修習本課程後，學生可以了解：1. 金屬積層製造方法的原理與材料限制 2. 金屬列印件的設計考量、前處理與後處理 3. 各種列印方法的加工參數設定與其對列印件的影響 4.ASTM 規範金屬列印件的巨觀測試方法與微觀檢測方法 5. 金屬列印件的輕量化拓樸結構優化設計與分析 6. 金屬積層製造的數值分析方法
description.en: Additive manufacturing technology, also known as 3D printing, has attempted to revolutionize the entire manufacturing ecosystem over the past decade. It has evolved beyond prototyping and small-scale production, reaching an economically viable scale for mass production. Although additive manufacturing can be categorized into seven major types based on processing methods, when classified by engineering materials, metals hold the highest economic value and are the most widely applied in industrial settings. Therefore, this course primarily focuses on metal additive manufacturing methods, explaining the processes that enable metal 3D printing, and bridging the gap between academia and industry. The course also covers material selection for metal 3D printing, design considerations for printed parts, optimization of processing parameters, life time testing of printed parts, and numerical simulation.After completing this course, students will understand and can briefly explained:1. The p

notes: 機電所、製科所、外生專班合開

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 2/11 停開【停開】

description.zh: (1) 行動計算簡介 (2) 無線通訊網路 (3) 系統層支援機制 (4) 行動位置管理 (5) 動態資源路由 (6) 行動資料庫與交易管理 (7) 行動隨意型與感測網路 (8) 無線與行動計算之研究議題
description.en: (1)Introduction to mobile computing(2)Wireless communication networks(3)System-level supports,(4)Mobile Location management,(5)Dynamic resource routing,(6)Mobile database and transaction management,(7)Mobile and hoc and sensor networks,(8)Rresearch issues in wireless and mobile computing.

notes: 新聘教師

description.zh: 本課程介紹科技論文寫作與報告，課程內容包括科技論文寫作元素介紹 (摘要、介紹、方法、結果、討論、結論) 與撰寫方式，文獻搜尋與整理，報告與發表注意事項，以利環境所碩博士生應用於未來論文撰寫與成果發表。
description.en: This class focuses on the Introduction of major elements in technical writing, including abstract, introduction, research methods, results, discussion, and conclusion. Writing grammar, style, and methods to perform literature search and review are also introduced. The main aim of this course is enhancing the ability of graduate students in future thesis writing and research publication.

notes: 億光大樓 1342 室

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩一

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

notes: 共同 303A

description.zh: 學術論文簡報的能力是學術專業人員所必備的專業知能，以清楚簡明的方法傳遞專業科學的內容，需要報告者展現清楚的語言溝通能力。而本課程即是在培養學生具備在國際會議場合上進行學術論文簡報的能力。課程內容包括：優化學生英文基本能力、熟悉學術英文簡報的架構、學習使用資料視覺化傳遞科學研究發現，以及建立個人簡報風格等循序開展。修課學生需要具備基本的英文能力，並具備閱讀英文撰寫之學術報告的能力。學期間授課教師以講授法與小組合作介紹學術論文簡報的架構、製作學術論文簡報的注意事項、介紹常用之學術英文表現句型，並帶領學生每週撰寫一篇 10 分鐘的英文演說稿，最後學生以英文進行個人學術論文簡報作為最終考核的成果。
description.en: In today's international scientific community, an academic professional is required to present his/her scientific works in a professional manner in English. It is necessary that a scientist can deliver his/her own idea in a clear and precise language.  This course is designed to prepare the students with the ability doing academic presentation in an international conference. The contents of this course include the improvement of students' English proficiency, the introduction of the academic presentation format, and the delivery of key findings by using data visualization skills.  It is required that the students should have basic English capacity and can read a scientific report written in English.  The course material would be delivered by the instructor through weekly class literature and the team work projects. By the end of semester, the students would know the popular sentences used to express their result findings. The students would also learn how to make their own academic p

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博二

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

description.zh: 本課程探討田口品質工程方法和智慧型參數設定，以提高產品品質和製程性能。各種產品設計和製程參數值需被決定，參數的設定應使其受製造環境的變化所產生的影響減到最小，即為穩健設計。運用本方法可顯著降低製造過程中的缺陷率，並減少生產成本，同時提高產品的品質和可靠性。
description.en: This class delineates Taguchi based quality engineering methods and computational intelligence approaches to improve product quality and process performance. The nominal values of the various dimensions and design parameters need to be determined. The parameters are chosen so as to minimize the effects on performance arising from variation in manufacturing g environment. This is called robustification. The defect rate during manufacturing shows noticeable improvement, the production cost is significantly lower, and the quality and reliability of products can be enhanced.

notes: 工管所和管理博班合開

description.zh: 1. 解析法 2. 變分法 3. 動差法 4. 有限元素法 5. 譜域分析法 6. 傳輸線矩陣法
description.en: 1.Analytical Method 2.Variational Method 3.Moment Method 4.Finite 5.Spectral Domain Analysis 6.Transmission Line Matrix

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 1. 光纖感測介紹，2. 光纖感測元件，3. 光纖感測系統，4. 光纖感測多工技術，5. 光纖雷射感測系統，6. 長距離光纖感測系統，7. 大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8. 光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

notes: 光電四、光電所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1. 簡介 2. 數位影像處理基礎 3. 影像的轉換 4. 影像的增強 5. 影像的復原 6. 影像的壓縮 7. 影像的分割   8. 影像的表達及描述 9. 醫學影像的處理和應用 10. 利用雷射光做 3D 電腦視覺
description.en: 1.Introdution  2.Principles of digital image processing   3.Image transformation 4.Image enhancement 5.Image restoration 6.Image compression 7.Image partition 8.Image description 9.Medical image and applications 10.3D computer vision based on laser

notes: 光電四、光電所和電資外生班合開，逾修課人數上限加選

description.zh: 此課程乃銜接雷射工程一課，進一步探討現今高功率光纖雷射系統之原理，工程技術與相關工業應用。主要涵蓋內容如下：1. 雷射原理回顧 2. 光纖光學 3. 增益光纖與高功率元件 4. 高功率光纖雷射系統 5.Q 開關光纖雷射系統 6. 鎖模光纖雷射系統 7. 光纖雷射放大器系統 8. 光纖雷射加工應用 9. 光纖耦合之半導體雷射加工應用
description.en: It is the follow-up course of laser engineering. It further discusses the principles, engineering techniques and related industrial applications of advanced high-power fiber laser systems. The main contents are listed below:1. Overview of laser basic theory2. Fiber optics3. Rare-earth doped gain fiber and fiber based high-power devices4. High-power fiber laser systems5. Q-switched fiber laser systems6. Mode-locked fiber laser systems7. Fiber laser MOPA8. Fiber laser sources in micro-machining9. Fiber pigtailed diode laser in industry applications

name.zh: 高功率光纖雷射科技與應用
name.en: High-Power fiber laser technology and application

description.zh: 本課程的主題將集中於奈米薄膜的光學性質，討論介質以及金屬鍍膜材料所製作的奈米結構。本課程將介紹許多新穎的應用，包括完美抗反射、偏極轉換器、偏極分光器與完美波片。進一步根據局部電漿效應對於金屬與介質複合薄膜的影響可發展超穎材料薄膜。本課程包含設計、製程與量測，透過課程學習，學生可學會奈米光學薄膜的完整知識。(1) 課程簡介 (2) 斜向沉積技術技術 (3) 光學非均向薄膜 (4) 等效介質理論 (5) 表面電漿理論 (6) 長程表面電漿 (7) 超穎材料 (8) 完美抗反射與波板 (9) 感測技術 (10) 仿生薄膜 (11) 偏極態量測 (12) 橢圓偏光儀
description.en: The topics of this course will focus on optical properties of nanostructured thin films. The discussed nanostructures are made of common used dielectric and metal coating materials. Many novel applications including perfect antireflection, polarization converter, beam splitters, and perfect waveplate will be introduced here. Furthermore, deposited metamaterial thin films are developed based on local plasmon effect within the metal-dielectric composite films. This course involves design, fabrication and measurement. The students should have learned and passed the course.(1) Introduction (2) Oblique angle deposition (3) Optical anisotropic thin films (4) Effective Medium Approximation (5) Plasmonics (6) Long range surface plasmon (7) Metamaterials (8) Perfect antireflection and waveplate(9) Sensing technique (10) Bioinspired and biomimetic thin films (11) Polarization measurements (12) Ellipsometry

description.zh: 本課程程主要為介紹深度學習和生成式人工智慧概念和基本原理。通過掌握這些原理，學生能了解可能極限，更能思考深度學習和和生成式人工智慧的應用。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the concepts and basic principles of deep learning and generative artificial intelligence. By mastering these principles, students can understand the limits of what is possible and be better able to think about the applications of deep learning and generative artificial intelligence.

name.zh: 深度學習和生成式人工智慧導論
name.en: Introduction to Deep Learn and Generative Artificial Intelligence

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的規劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告製作可如何掌握、發揮互動式媒體的特性，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程亦教導同學如何應用電腦影像（computer imaging）與多媒體的科技與技術，來製作互動式廣告。
description.en: This course is mainly about the planning and principles of interactive advertisement production such as features of interactive media, how can advertisement production control and develop the features of interactive media, as well as the related concepts, technology, and skills needed in order to build, design, develop, and maintain interactive advertisement. Students will learn how to use computer imaging and the technology and techniques of multi-media to make an interactive advertisement.

notes: 一般教室，限 20 人

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理，2 週【停開】

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修 (工管)

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修 (經管)

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修 (資財)

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解各類口譯實務。學生認識專業口譯員具備之技術與語言能力。實務訓練強化進階口譯技巧，包括積極聆聽、記憶、快速反應、摘要與口譯筆記等。視譯與逐步口譯之訓練以一般性與技術性題材為主，涵蓋政治、財經與全球時事等。
description.en: The course aims to provide students with a practical insight into different modes of interpreting. Practical exercises aimed at developing active listening, memory, quick reflexes, gist extraction and note-taking skills at a more advanced level will be introduced. The training of sight translation and consecutive interpreting involves the use of general and technical speeches in politics, business, world affairs and other fields.

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 課程與教學

notes: 共同 303A, 開學第一週上課未出席者不得加選

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

notes: 共同 302

description.zh: 本課程除了讓學生透過論文閱讀與評析增進自我的評判技巧之外，也將透過數位學習相關國際研討會、國際期刊的審查標準來了解專家審查時所注意的面向。
description.en: The course is designed to assist students not only to enhance their criteria of reviewing articles, but also to understand the experts’ review standards in e-learning related international conferences and Journals.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

notes: 開學第一週上課未出席者不得加選

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: The course is designed to make the graduate understand the basic concept of instruction, to realize the various strategies for instruction in technical-vocational education, and to know how to apply and evaluate the strategies.

notes: 須同時修 345181 博士論文且本學期畢業者才能選讀

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹人工智慧（AI）領域包含各種機器學習的開發與實作，特別關注如何使用 Python 進行模型的開發與部屬。課程將涵蓋深度學習的基本概念、常見的 AI 框架（如 TensorFlow、Keras），並深入探討如何利用 Python 編程語言來設計、訓練與優化 AI 模型。此外，課程也將重點討論人工智慧在開發與部屬過程中需要考量的安全性問題，從資料安全與可稽核性，AI 透明度，模型加密與攻擊防範等，提供學生一套全面的安全檢核框架。學生將學習如何確保 AI 系統在實際應用中具備高度的安全性與可靠性，並瞭解如何在 AI 部屬的不同階段識別與解決潛在的安全風險。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the development and implementation of various machine learning techniques in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI), with a particular focus on how to use Python for model development and deployment. The course will cover the fundamental concepts of deep learning, popular AI frameworks (such as TensorFlow and Keras), and will delve into how to use the Python programming language to design, train, and optimize AI models. Additionally, the course will emphasize the security considerations necessary during the development and deployment of AI systems, including data security and auditability, AI transparency, model encryption, and attack prevention. Students will be provided with a comprehensive security framework to evaluate these concerns. They will also learn how to ensure the high security and reliability of AI systems in practical applications, and how to identify and mitigate potential security risks at various stages of AI deployment.

notes: 資財四甲資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在瞭解國際金融科技的發展趨勢，並探討台灣目前金融科科技產業發展情形與因應作為。課程內容除了理論基礎介紹外，將邀請金融科技產業企業領袖與專業菁英演講，與學生交流互動，學生也須進行實作加深學習效果，希望藉此課程能讓學生掌握當前國際與台灣金融市場金融科技最新之實務脈動，分析並預測未來可能之發展。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand the development trends of international financial technology and to explore the current situation and responses of Taiwan's financial technology industry. In addition to introducing theoretical foundations, the course will invite leaders and professionals from the financial technology industry to give lectures and interact with students. Students will also engage in hands-on practice to deepen their learning. Through this course, it is hoped that students will gain insight into the latest practical trends in international and Taiwanese financial markets, and analyze and predict potential future developments in financial technology.

notes: 資財四甲資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程結合設計思考與深度學習技術，專為金融領域應用而設計。學生將學習設計思考的五個核心步驟：同理心、問題定義、創意發想、原型設計和測試，並運用這些步驟解決金融實際問題。課程內容涵蓋數據收集與清洗、特徵工程、深度學習模型構建與訓練，及模型部署與應用。學生將使用 Pandas、NumPy、Keras、TensorFlow 等工具，進行數據處理和模型開發，並通過 PBL 項目進行實務操作，體驗跨域合作的過程。課程特別強調實務應用，涵蓋信用風險評估、股票價格預測、信用卡欺詐檢測等金融案例。學生將參與多次業界專家分享和企業參訪，了解最新的行業動態和實務經驗。本課程致力於培養具備前瞻性思維、創新能力和實務操作能力的金融科技專業人才。
description.en: This course combines design thinking and deep learning techniques tailored for financial applications. Students will explore the five key steps of design thinking: empathy, problem definition, ideation, prototyping, and testing. These steps will be applied to solve practical financial challenges.The course content includes data collection and cleaning, feature engineering, deep learning model building, training, and deployment. Students will work with tools like Pandas, NumPy, Keras, and TensorFlow for data analysis and model development. The learning process is enriched through PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects, offering hands-on experience in interdisciplinary teamwork.By integrating technical skills and innovative thinking, this course aims to develop forward-thinking financial technology professionals equipped with practical expertise.

notes: 資財四甲資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹環境、社會和治理 (ESG) 投資的概念。ESG 投資，也稱為永續投資，是一種將 ESG 因素與基本面分析結合起來進行投資決策的投資策略。首先，我將介紹一些投資的基本概念，例如績效衡量和因子模型分析。接下來，我將介紹 ESG 因子，並從學術研究和實務觀點討論 ESG 投資。此外，我將為您提供有關 ESG 投資的另類觀點。最後，本課程將關注全球暖化和氣候變遷議題，並提供修課同學環境教育的重要概念。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) investing. ESG investing, also referred to as sustainable investing, represents an investment strategy that incorporates ESG factors alongside fundamental analysis in investment decision-making. Initially, I will introduce some essential concepts of investment, such as performance measurement and factor model analysis. Next, I will review ESG factors and discuss ESG investing from both academic and practical perspectives. Furthermore, I will provide you with alternative viewpoints on ESG investing. Finally, I will focus on the issues of global warming and climate change, which are critical components of environmental education.

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

notes: 碩二必修 (桃資財)

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創業 0 到 2 的思維與實作

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各 20 位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 課程將以體驗式教學訓練，提升學員表達技巧、舞台技巧、臨場反應。本課程主要目的在教授學生以設計思考思維與策略，運用主題式課程實戰小組簡報及個人簡報，快速釐清簡報製作及表達過程中重點，提升修課學員個人簡報製作能力及表達能力，幫助學生在未來創業及就業上以出色之個人簡報能力獲得面試者及投資者的青睞，領先於起跑點取得優勢。
description.en: The course will use experiential teaching training to improve students' expression skills, stage skills, and on-the-spot reactions. The main purpose of this course is to teach students establishing design thinking strategies. During the course practice group presentations and personal presentations training students to quickly clarify the key points in the process of presentation production and presentation, to improve the students' personal presentation production and presentation skills. Furthermore, assist students' entrepreneurship and employment in the future. Students who finished this course will be favored by interviewers and investors with his excellent personal presentation skills. And he will gain an advantage over the starting point.

name.zh: 企業最愛：高質感簡報溝通力
name.en: Corporate's Favorite: High-quality Communication and Presentation Ability

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯講座課程」，藉由業界主管與人員介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 六週密集授課，大研合開

description.zh: 本課程著重於商業溝通及實務的應用。每個實例討論均能幫助學生了解英文商務應用，並且提供學生去研習，分析並將個人論點英文表達。課程的重點有二：加強學生理解英文在商業領域的重要性，增強學生在商業案件中的綜合分析的表達能力。此外，由實際的商業實務中反應出各種未來可能出現的不同挑戰，讓學生有機會學習應對。根據課程規定，學生須具備高級英文的能力跟基本的商業知識。
description.en: The course explores the intersection of the English language communication and cases in real business world. Each case to be discussed in this course illustrates the many aspects of business operations and provides students with the opportunities to examine, to analyze and to present their views in English. The emphasis of the course is two-fold. While reinforcing the importance of business communications in English and enhancing students' analytical competence in discussing the cases, real-world business stories reflect a multitude of challenges to resolve and opportunities to embrace in hopes that students are well-prepare to cope with all these in the future to come. As the course prescribes, students are required to have an advanced English level and fundamental business knowledge.

notes: 英文三 & IMBA

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解科技管理觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）創新與研發管理（2）科技政策（3）技術預測（4）技術策略管理（5）技術開發與移轉（6）技術規劃與評估。
description.en: The course teaches the student Technology Management concepts and trend . The topics will be covered: (1) innovation and R&D management; (2) technology policy; (3) technology forecasting ; (4) technology strategy management ; (5) technology development and transfer; (6) technology planning and measurement.

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為培養學生將點子成功轉化為可行性募資提案，以柏克萊新創加速營模式，培養學生新創募資相關知識及提案簡報技能。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、顧客導向產品設計、提案規劃、簡報表達、募資、行銷、創業相關法律知識等。
description.en: The primary goal of this course is to equip students with the ability to successfully transform ideas into feasible crowdfunding proposals. Using the Berkeley startup accelerator model, the course helps students develop knowledge related to startup fundraising and presentation skills for proposals. Course content includes topics such as entrepreneurial spirit, innovative thinking, self-awareness, team formation, customer-oriented product design, proposal planning, presentation skills, fundraising, marketing, and legal knowledge related to entrepreneurship.

name.zh: 矽谷新創都在用的一分鐘電梯簡報
name.en: One-minute elevator pitches used by startups in Silicon Valley

notes: 假日密集授課時間 4/19-20 整天地點為先鋒 402、403 教室

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 六週密集授課、科技大樓國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在介紹計算智能、軟性計算與演化計算的相關演算法與進階應用。內容包括：爬山法與模擬退火、基因演算法、粒子群優演算法、蜂群演算法等相關內容。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the computational intelligence, soft computing, evolutionary algorithm, relative algorithms and their applications. The course covers the subjects on Hill-Climbing Algorithm, Simulated Annealing, Genetic Algorithm, Particle Swarm Optimization, Artificial Bee Colony and so on.

description.zh: 本課程介紹 OpenGL 與 OpenGL for Embedded Systems (OpenGL ES)。講授電腦圖學基本原理：幾何圖形、互動介面、幾何轉換、透視投影、明暗度計算、紋理貼圖、色彩原理等。接著介紹 3D 繪圖引擎、建模引擎、創作實例經驗談。修課學生必須熟悉 C 語言。課程並介紹近年來在多媒體產業應用非常多的擴增實境 (Augmented Reality, AR) 繪圖技術。本課訓練學生具備使用 OpenGL/OpenGL ES 程式庫、瞭解 3D 繪圖引擎、及運用擴增實境技術之能力，並能整合以上技術進行 3D 繪圖程式開發創作。
description.en: This course introduces 3D computer graphics. Topics include OpenGL, shading language, graphics pipeline, geometric, interactive interface, transformation, projection, hidden surfaces, shading, texture mapping, and color. This course introduces 3D rendering, modeling, and graphics engine. The student will be required to write computer programs using C language and OpenGL API. Topics of augmented reality (AR) will be covered in the class. The students will be able to develop 3D modeling, rendering, graphics, and augmented reality tools.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 "智慧" 的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1. 搜尋法則，2. 命題與敘述邏輯，3. 定理證明，4. 知識系統與知識表達， 5. 機器學習， 6. 基因與演化計算，7. 智慧型代理人。
description.en: Artificial intelligence seeks to introduce the elements of intelligence into programs and systems in application domain. Topics will include 1. Searching methods 2. Propositional and Predicate logic 3. Theorem Proving 4. Knowledge-based systems and representation of knowledge 5. Machine learning, 6. Genetic algorithms and evolutionary computing, 7. Intelligent agents.

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1) 管理常見之專有名詞，(2) 英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3) 會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4) 企業計劃書的編寫，及 (5) 現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 蛋白質與醣類科學課程是為進階研究所學生所設計的。這堂課的目標是在教導學生蛋白質科學和醣類科學最近的發展，以具體應用在醫療和生物科技產業為例子。學生必需要先修以下的課程： 一般有機化學， 生化， 蛋白質結構和醣質科學基礎科學。學生將預計學習蛋白質與醣類之結構， 蛋白質與醣類之生物合成，相關之具生物活性之醫療和生物科技蛋白質和多醣類。
description.en: The course is designed to teach upper level graduate students about the recent advances in protein science and glycobiology with specific application in medical and biotechnological industries. The prerequisite classes for this course are: general organic chemistry, biochemistry, protein structure and glycobiology. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive protein and glycconjugates.

description.zh: 當企業實施全球運籌經營模式；其市場行銷點、產品設計部門、製造工廠、配銷中心與維修服務中心時常散佈於全球不同地點，且各項文件資料或圖檔仍需在全球各點間依權限設定供企業內部與供應鏈成員瀏覽使用，以提昇產品價值與品質、快速回應客戶需求、降低產品設計與製造成本和企業獲利保證。故透過功能超強的網際網路基礎與企業電子化架構之經營環境為全球運籌之必備利器，亦即為虛擬企業之碁石。除此之外，企業亦可經由網際網路與電子化架構和供應商及客戶進行協同商務，可以確保供應鏈內的所有成員都能夠輕易的存取到最即時且正確的產品資訊，故可縮短協同行銷設計、協同產品設計、協同製程設計和協同配銷之週期時間，並提升產品開發團隊的互助合作。藉由設計知識的擷取與重複使用、溝通效率的提高、以及將客戶和供應商緊密的整合在一起，進而更快速的設計出更好的產品，也把重要的創新和寶貴知識傳遞給更多的合作伙伴和供應商，此即為虛擬價值鏈。企業電子化管理課程將介紹企業資源規劃 (ERP)、供應鏈管理 (SCM)、RFID 之應用，產品資料管理 (PDM)、虛擬製程設計，製造執行系統 (MES) 與生產現場資訊整合系統 (SFIS)、知識管理 (KM) 等電子化模組以及它們如何串連以營運虛擬企業，另外
description.en: At present stage, globalization and multiple-sites running are evitable for enterprise to save cost and accomplish the aim of more profit. Therefore, E-business running is necessary to reach quicker response and share the updating information and documentation among multiple-sites and its supply chain. These information and documentation are accessed globally between marketing department, R&D department, production shop floor, financial department, service center, and retailers. To keep correct information and connection, enterprises have to acknowledge the flow process of each E-modules. More often, enterprises have to monitor each E-modules to guarantee the employee do their jobs based on correct and update information. In addition, the global competition became more intensive between supply chains. That is, a supply chain competes with another supply chain. Therefore, the collaborative capabilities for the members within a supply chain became more crucial. The collaborative commerce

notes: 限博生，與管理博合開，請於開學後加選。

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧的人文導論

notes: 臺大謝舒凱，* 限人社領域學生修習

name.zh: 生成式 AI 文字與圖像生成原理實務

陽明交大彭文孝等，詳 https://myppt.cc/KrzIJC
清大胡敏君，詳 https://myppt.cc/KrzIJC

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生了解鐵道號誌系統的基本原理，同時藉由此課程了解現代通訊技術的概念，以此建立對於鐵道列車的控制基本觀念。
description.en: This course mainly allows students to understand the basic principles of the railway signaling system, and at the same time understand the concepts of modern communication technology through this course, so as to establish the basic concepts of railway train control.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

notes: 碩二修

description.zh: 戰略管理使用綜合管理視角去解決相關的制定和實施企業和企業級戰略的問題。該課程包括開發識別問題的能力，評估戰略選擇，並瞭解戰略的形成和執行的組織過程。它建立在功能區課程所獲得的知識，並使用案例研究和項目，以提高學生的分析和決策能力。前提：必須參與上學期的課程或與得到研究生導師的許可。
description.en: Strategic management uses a general management perspective in addressing issues related to the formulation and implementation of corporate and business level strategy. The course involves developing the ability to identify issues, evaluate strategic options and understand the organizational process by which strategies get formed and executed. It builds on the knowledge gained in functional area courses and uses case studies and projects to improve students' analytical and decision-making skills. Prerequisite: Must be taken in last semester or with permission of the Graduate Advisor.

notes: UTA, 碩二修，Dr. Liliana,12/1 輔課，12/13-16 正課

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes: 1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking. 5. Writing method. 6. Present method. 7. Research design practice

notes: 碩二修

description.zh: 該課程強調關鍵的經濟和商業概念（包括對需求和供應，生產，成本和利潤的分析；市場支配力；戰略行為和定價；國際貿易理論）影響決策。
description.en: The course emphasizes key economic and business concepts(including analysis of demand and supply, production, cost, and profit; market power, strategic behavior, and pricing; international trade theories) that influence decisions.

notes: UTA, 碩一修，Dr.Mahmut Yasar,3/1 輔課；3/7-10 正課

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

notes: UTA, 碩一修，8/1-4

description.zh: 本課程以實踐機器人和人工智慧應用為核心，採用美國麻省理工學院 (MIT) 的專案任務導向學習模式。透過結合講授、討論、實際應用和案分析，課程將會幫助學生深入理解人工智慧和機器人技術。學生有機會積極參與小組專案，透過情境思考實際應用所學知識，並親自操作機器學習工具和機器人平臺，以培養實際技能。
description.en: This course is designed for practical application of robotics and artificial intelligence (AI). It adopts the project-based learning model inspired by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). The course combines lectures, discussions, practical applications, and case studies to provide students with an in-depth understanding of AI and robotics technology. Students will have the opportunity to engage in group projects, apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios, and gain hands-on experience with machine learning tools and robot platforms.

name.zh: 機器人智慧：AI 應用與發展

notes: 先鋒 1 樓 城市科學實驗室

description.zh: 循環型建築專題旨在深入探討循環經濟理念如何融入建築領域，結合搖籃到搖籃（cradle to cradle) 的理論和「以終為始」的設計方法，學習分析國內外成功的循環型建築案例，掌握再生建材選用、模組化設計等相關技術應用，系統性地探討如何在建築設計、材料選擇與建築全生命周期管理中，實現資源的高效利用與廢棄物的最小化，並運用環境評估工具量化建築的環境效益，引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，以及創新的建築設計解決方案，最終培養其在循環經濟框架下的永續建築設計能力。
description.en: The course aims to explore in depth how the principles of the circular economy can be integrated into the field of architecture. By combining the *Cradle to Cradle* theory with the "designing from the end" approach, students will analyze successful cases of circular architecture from both domestic and international contexts. They will gain proficiency in key technical applications, such as the selection of recycled materials and modular design. The course systematically examines how to achieve efficient resource utilization and minimize waste across architectural design, material selection, and building lifecycle management. Students will also learn to apply environmental assessment tools to quantify the environmental benefits of buildings. By fostering interdisciplinary learning, the course encourages students to propose architectural concepts that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。涵蓋家具與室內設計，藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Universal Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of furniture and interior design development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable furniture and interior design which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality furniture and interior design. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

notes: 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 同學們在修過第一年所開的所有的必修課之後，從第三個學期開始，在指導老師的引領下，必須開始著手準備碩士論文的撰寫：選擇論文題目，收集資料，通過論文大綱審查，開始撰寫論文. . . 等等的步驟。從第三個學期開始須修二期之「論文」課程。在論文口試委員們接受該論文並在文件上簽名後，同學們可同時拿到六個學分，完成本碩士課程 "論文" 這一項的要求。
description.en: After completing all the required courses in the first year, every student is encouraged to initiate the working process toward the completion of his/her MA thesis under the supervision of an advisor. Starting from the third semester, it is required for the student to register for "Thesis" for two semesters.  The "Thesis" courses aim to lead graduate students through the process of preparing, writing and completing an MA thesis.  After the committee members agree on the acceptability of the thesis and sign the official document, the student will get a total of 6 credits for "Thesis," fulfilling part of the requirement for a MA degree.

description.zh: 在各指導教授的指導下，從事鐵道產業技術相關領域的論文寫作，論文內容須包含研究方法或實驗方法、理論分析、研究結果和結論。
description.en: A thesis of Ms. Degree should be proposed by all students associated with the agreement of their advising professor. The thesis should focus on the fields in "Railway Industry Technology", and include research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings..

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測 (溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測 (水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線) 及地下水 (土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

notes: 土木 505

description.zh: 本課程之目的為讓技術導向博士班學生於學期間至本所各分組專業相關之企業、政府單位或具規模之其他機構從事全職實務技術研發工作，讓技術導向博士生除發展學術理論外，更擁有業界實務經驗，以成為學養精湛且具有實務技能之高階專業人才。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the technique-orientated Ph.D. students . During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry / business-oriented agencies working as a full-time R & D practical job. Course takers are in addition to developing technology-oriented doctoral level academic theory, but also has practical experience in the industry, to become a highly specialized personnel with practical professional skills.

name.en: Internship of practical technology research and development

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓研究生可以利用學期中、暑期、或寒假 (可跨學期) 至指導教授認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實務研發，以增進研究生之實務研究能力。研究生於指導教授認可之校外研發機構的實務研究總累計時數不得低於 320 小時 (於 (跨) 學期中、暑期、或寒假期間)，研究生於校外實務研發期滿後，由校外研發機構出具研究生於該機構之實務研發證明與實務研究成績；研究生並且必須繳交實務研發紀錄及實務研究心得報告予指導教授，指導教師依據研究生之實務研發紀錄及心得報告，指導研究生撰寫成實務研究成果報告，彙交所屬系所保存，並作為成績核定之依據。研究生校外實務研究學期成績之評定比例原則：校外實務研發機構占 50%，研究生指導教授占 50%。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to promote an all-round ability for the graduate students at NTUT. During the summer break , graduate students are required to go to the organizations or agencies with respect to their individual research topics and future development by undergoing the on site research. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with a time span of no less than 320 hours. The students will also need to present to the thesis advisor the on-site research document which will thus be collected and deposited in the individual department or graduate institute office. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organizations or agencies (50%), respectively.

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體機台的設計原理、操作與預防保養有基礎的概念。2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解。3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Know the basic concept of the design principle, operation and preventive maintenance about semiconductor tools.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

notes: 密集授課，至台積電，詳教學大綱
